author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1705774980}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102985231', 'num_games_owned': 1052, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1705529325}
review:
Serinin dördüncü oyunu olan temel olarak mantık aynı inşa, tamir kaynak toplamak onu kaldır bunu kaldır şeklinde genel olarak diğer serilerdeki gibi ilerliyor. Oyunun zorluk seviyeside iyi sayılır. Hikayemizde kısaca yine herkülle alakalı herkülü zehirlemeye çalışırlar herkül iyileşir atılır macereye diye gidiyor.

Diğer serilere göre daha sıkıcı özellikle müzikleri bu sefer inanılmaz kötü muhtemelen bu tarz oyunlarda kendi müziklerinizi açıyorsunuzdur ama bu oyunda gerçekten kötü. Kısacası kart düşürmek için girdiğim seride garip bir şekilde oynayıp ama dördüncü oyununu pek beğenmediğim bir oyun olmuştur.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073861981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 562, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 562, 'last_played': 1700903264}
review:
윈도우 10에서 했는데 인트로 화면이 검게 변하고 멈춥니다. 잠시 기다리면 정상 실행됩니다. 전작도 같은 증상이 있습니다.

4편에서 추가된 것. 게임 내 가이드가 생겼습니다. 숨겨진 퍼즐 찾는 게 귀찮으신가요? 가이드에 해답이 있습니다. 개발자 기록을 깨면 큰 별이 그려진 깃발이 꽂힙니다. 내가 개발자 기록을 깼는지 아닌지를 지도에서 바로 확인할 수 있습니다.

도전 과제 100% 달성 쉽습니다. 개발자 기록을 10회 깨야 합니다. 커트라인이 까다롭지 않습니다. 익스퍼트 모드 별 3개 받는 걸 목표로 해보면 10개 이상 깨집니다. 모든 레벨에서 별 3개 과제는 캐주얼 모드로 해도 됩니다. 물건 5개 이상 찾는 건 2.4에서, 도둑 관련 과제는 2.8 또는 5.2에서 깰 수 있습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198273010303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 894, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 884, 'last_played': 1685917432}
review:
[h3] Enjoyable (4th game in the series) [/h3]

[b] Game Modes [/b]
Relaxed ~ No time constraints. No gold stars to collect.
Casual ~ Normal  mode, with gold stars.
Expert ~ More challenging, with gold stars.
[i]Can be selected anytime during the game.[/i]

[b] Bonus levels [/b]
Collect the hidden puzzle pieces to access a picture puzzle and additional bonus level for each of the 5 chapters.
 
[b] Achievements [/b] x22
Yet again there are 2 challenging achievements that require the player to get a higher score than the devs; for 1 and 10 levels. The required multiple replays quickly gets tedious.
Can't be bothered with these.

[b] Extras [/b]
Main menu option for 9 wallpapers.
In-game guide. Shows the hidden objects for each level.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027047516', 'num_games_owned': 2313, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 914, 'last_played': 1665500066}
review:
This review is specially made for those who like to get all the achievements in games and have this one in their backlog (minor spoilers ahead).

[b]Description:[/b]  
12 Labors of Hercules IV is a casual puzzle/time management game with an ancient Greece theme where you have to collect resources around a map and then spend those resources constructing and repairing buildings and activating heroes to progress further in the map and fulfill the stage objectives. There are cutscenes that explain the main events of the story, but in this forth game of the series, the story has moved far beyond the classic mythology stories.

The game has an isometric view and the graphics look ok for a casual game. The characters and heroes like Hercules himself and Medusa have a cartoonish look but are easily recognizable.

The gameplay gets a bit repetitive since very few new mechanics are added. The only challenge you face is figuring out what to collect and build first and the best path to take, but most of the time clicking semi-randomly on stuff is enough to win, except when you’re trying to beat the developer's score, to be able to do this you need a efficiency and a few tries to figure it out

But this fourth game changes some things when compared to the first one. There aren’t any boss fights now, only puzzles you need to on the levels of each chapter, and later assemble to unlock a bonus level, and there’s also a new challenge: beating the developper’s score, which will grant you a big star completion medal. One of the main changes is the appearance of an evil clone of Hercules that will block your workers and needs to be removed, and goat-like enemies that steal your resources. Also, there aren’t any storage buildings but outposts where the workers can drop materials, and obelisks that add bonuses were also added and can now be constructed in some of the levels. 

[b]Achievements:[/b]  
[b]How many:[/b] 22 Achievements.
[b]How much time:[/b] Around 10 hours.
[b]Game difficulty:[/b] Very Easy. The levels can be passed with a gold rating quite easily if you play on casual, otherwise it will require a few tries until you figure out the optimal order to pick and build things.
[b]Achievements’ Difficulty:[/b] Easy. Compared to the first game the toughest challenge is beating the developer's scores, it requires a few tries but isn’t hard to accomplish. My suggestion is trying to beat the score on the first 12 levels, the first seven will be the easiest, but the others require a few more tries. Keeping a queue of tasks prevents wasting time, but you still need to pick the right things to build in the right order, and sometimes also pick the best path.
 
[b]Overall opinion:[/b]  
12 Labors of Hercules IV is an okay casual game that’s easy to play, but gets repetitive fast, so my advice is playing it in small doses. This fourth game adds a few extra challenges that require a few tries but they are not very hard to complete.
 

[b]Join and follow my group [u][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/42556190-Ribbon-Hunters/] Ribbon Hunters[/url][/u] for more suggestions and reviews of easy indie games to get all the achievements.[/b]

review:
[h1] [b](ツ)_/¯[/b] 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature (Platinum Edition) [/h1]
[code]                                Recenzja stworzona przez [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/maxiisteam/] Maxi [/url][/code]
Oto czwarta część  przygód Hercules’a gdzie wcielamy się w niego jak i jego pomocników. Mamy wiele map gdzie musimy zniszczyć przeszkody, zbierać jedzenie czy też surowce do funkcjonowania.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1785094754
Na to wszystko goni nas czas, im szybciej ukończmy poziom tym więcej zdobędziemy punktów. Gra jest dość prosta do opanowania lecz nie staje się monotonna. Na wszelakich promocjach możemy zakupić ten tytuł za dosłownie grosze, więc polecam poczekać z zakupem. 
Z całego serducha, jak najbardziej polecam zapoznać się z tytułem. 
[list]
    [*] Jeśli uważasz, że moja recenzja jest przydatna zostaw pozytywną ocenę
    [*] Więcej recenzji znajdziesz u mnie na profilu
 [/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198099042292', 'num_games_owned': 1374, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1649770528}
review:
Entiendo que haya gente que le guste este género de juegos, personalmente me entretienen, pero para pasar el rato. El problema de este juego es la nula curva de dificultad que tiene y cómo completar el juego al completo no supone un reto (como mucho, el logro de superar 10 récords del equipo de devs), descontando por supuesto el freeze habitual al arrancar el juego sin ningún motivo aparente y con un equipo con potencia de sobras.

En resumen: ¿Entretenido? Sí, pero los primeros 20 minutos. Si aparece el juego en un bundle, adelante, pero estoy convencido que hay mil juegos mejores del mismo estilo.

author: {'steamid': '76561199086098585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1657740056}
review:
[h3]12 Labours Of Hercules IV: Mother Nature[/h3]
[u]Zeitmanagement[/u]

Die Serie hat es mir irgendwie besonders angetan, auch wenn Optik und Spielprinzip sehr große Ähnlichkeit mit einigen anderen Serien hat (z.B. Gnomes Garden u.a.). Da es aber immer wieder hübsch aussieht und mir auch die Musik beim Spielen gefällt, weiß ich ja, was mich erwartet.

Diesmal rächten sich die Götter wegen Hercules´ letztem Sieg und ließen ein Ungetüm das ganze Land verwüsten. Jetzt soll der leidgeprüfte Held mit seiner Gattin Megara alles wieder in Ordnung bringen, und dafür haben sich die Entwickler wieder ein hübsches Leveldesign ausgedacht.

Wie immer in dieser Spielereihe kann man sich aussuchen, ob man einfach nur zum entspannten Zeitvertreib spielt oder es darauf anlegt, die Level in "Goldzeit" zu schaffen, wofür man am Ende mit einem kompletten Palastbau und Errungenschaften belohnt wird - Bonuslevel inclusive.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2792945616
Das Spiel nach der Uhr ist herausfordernd aber schaffbar. Diesmal gibt es auch eine besondere Herausforderung, nämlich die Rekorde der Entwickler zu schlagen. Es ist also für jeden Anspruch ein Spielmodus vorhanden. 

Das Prinzip des Spiels sollte bekannt sein - es geht wieder darum, in jedem Level die vorgegebenen Ziele zu erreichen, wofür Du Hercules´ emsige Helfer los schickst, um Wege freizuräumen und Ressourcen zu sammeln bzw. zu produzieren. Das kann beim Spiel auf Zeit schon mal schief gehen, wenn man keine Prioritäten setzt und es kann auch oft schon mal richtig knapp werden, noch in der genannten Goldzeit zum Ende des Levels zu kommen.

Die 100% Errungenschaften sind diesmal ein wenig schwieriger als sonst, es hat aber für viele (und auch für mich) einen gewissen Reiz, alle zu erringen, daher geht da schon mal ein wenig mehr Zeit drauf als beim einfachen Durchspielen ohne die Uhr - nach 14 Stunden Spielzeit war es dieses Mal geschafft.

Ein fehlerfreier weiterer Teil der Hercules Reihe, den ich jedem, der das Genre mag, ans Herz legen kann.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152877230', 'num_games_owned': 808, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 889, 'last_played': 1645366471}
review:
Czwarta część gierki dla dzieci, gdzie mamy łatwe osiągnięcia do zrobienia.
Ta część na plus wnosi zmianę terenu, natomiast od tej części przestano wspierać polskie tłumaczenie ale dzieciom raczej to nie przeszkodzi w graniu, wydłużono rozgrywkę co męczy dodatkowo.
Nadal ta gra mało co ma wspólnego z mitologią grecką, przewijają się w niej postaci z niej, ale bez żadnych wyjaśnień.
Moim meczącym pytaniem w tej grze było "skąd hydranty w starożytnej Grecji?"
Ta część mnie już wymęczyła, to i dlatego nie polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151163731', 'num_games_owned': 1632, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 1312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1312, 'last_played': 1640918112}
review:
This game is the exact same as the Alicia Quatermain series, except with Hercules, Megara, Midas and their "peers". I found this game to be slightly better looking overall and with better soundtracks than the Alicia Quatermain games. I have not played 12 Labours of Hercules I, II nor III, so I can't compare to those. After playing the game for a while (trying to get the achievements for instance), you might injure your hand/fingers. This is a game where you click a lot. 

This is not the best game for completionists in that some of the achievements need some higher skills than a regular players. I managed to get them all, but it took me a while. You'll need to switch the difficulty level to hard to get better score than the developers. Better do that one in the lower maps. Don't pick a bonus map for achievements, except the gold-time-in-bonus-maps achievements of course.

Recommended to players who like to click a lot, and timed puzzles of sorts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120519011', 'num_games_owned': 1116, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 449, 'last_played': 1642101581}
review:
Что нового:
[list]
    [*]пожар на дороге, мешающий пройти и пожарные гидранты
    [*]в начале уровня у вас уже есть некоторое количество ресурсов
    [*]порталы
[/list]
Осталось прежним:
[list]
    [*]геймплейные механики в целом
    [*]рисовка
    [*]музыка
    [*]сбор кусочков пазла для открытия бонусных уровней
[/list]
По сути это просто набор из 50 новых уровней. Даже на харде проходятся с легкостью. Оставшийся запас времени можно использовать для стрельбы по птичкам. Приятная убивалка времени, своих денег стоит, тем более со скидкой. 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198032029345', 'num_games_owned': 3666, 'num_reviews': 309, 'playtime_forever': 613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 613, 'last_played': 1547245761}
review:
12 Labours of Hercules to seria gier, które należą do gatunku "krzyżówkowych rozrywek". Mam tutaj na myśli fakt, że pomysł na grę jest eksploatowany seryjnie, a pomiędzy kolejnymi częściami są tylko nieznaczne różnice. 

Ponieważ każda część Herculesa jest bardzo podobna, postanowiłem zrobić mały eksperyment i napisać jedną recenzję dla 5 części w formie mini gry paragrafowej. Ciekaw jestem jak wam się spodoba ten pomysł, dajcie znać w komentarzach.

Rozwinięty wstęp dostępny jest w tej recenzji:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/mg_mat/recommended/342580]12 Labours of Hercules[/url]

Jeśli chcesz przeczytać jak wygląda rozgrywka, kliknij w link do tej recenzji :
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/mg_mat/recommended/360640]12 Labours of Hercules II: The Cretan Bull[/url]

Jeśli wolisz poczytać o muzyce i grafice, to zapraszam tutaj:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/mg_mat/recommended/360650]12 Labours of Hercules III: Girl Power[/url]

[h1]Mini-gry i dodatki[/h1]
W grze poza główną rozgrywką, dostępne są też rożne mini gry oraz bonusy. Jedną z takich mini-gier jest wyszukiwanie na planszach ukrytych kawałków puzzli (jeden na poziom), co po przejściu konkretnego rozdziału daje nam możliwość ułożenia małych puzzli, a to z kolei odblokuje nam bonusowy etap. Zazwyczaj etapy bonusowe cechują się nietypowym celem do wykonania, lub śmieszną historyjką itp. W późniejszych częściach gry dochodzą też cuda świata, które aby odblokować trzeba ukończyć wszystkie etapy w złotym czasie ( stąd też, nie mam pojęcia, co poza satysfakcją taki cud daje, bo żadnej części nie ukończyłem na 100%:)).  jest tez mini-gra polegająca na odnajdywaniu ukrytych obiektów na planszy( Co zwiększa punktację za poziom). Podejrzewam, że rożnych innych bonusów można się spodziewać w kolejnych częściach gry, ale do części 5 to właściwie wszystkie. Warto jeszcze zaznaczyć, że na głównej mapie gry, są odnotowane w formie graficznej nasze osiągnięcia i ogólnie rzecz biorąc, "mapa świata" jeśli tak to można nazwać wygląda bardzo ładnie i jest przejrzysta pomimo sporej ilości elementów.

Bardziej rozbudowane podsumowanie + bonus, przeczytasz w recenzji:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/mg_mat/recommended/491330]12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas[/url]

[h1]Podsumowanie:[/h1]
Gatunek ten stał się popularny jakieś 6 lat temu. Owszem, można znaleźć podobne gry wcześniej, jednak to Hercules rozpropagował go na szerszą skalę. Polecam!

[b]PLUSY:[/b]
+ Bajkowa oprawa
+ Przyjemna muzyka
+ Sporo "bonusów" ( Zależnie od części)
+ Ciekawy pomysł na rozgrywkę
+ Może być dobrym "zabijaczem czasu"...

[b]MINUSY:[/b]
- ...O ile rozgrywka ci podejdzie
- Sporo "machania myszką"
- Dla niektórych, rozgrywka może być zbyt powtarzalna
- Nie każdy odnajdzie w niej swoją "krzyżówkową" rozrywkę
- Podobny styl muzyczny w każdej części, na dłuższą metę nuży

[h1]OCENA:
7/10[/h1]

[h1]Zapraszam do obserwacji naszego kuratora: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/26553378/] ŚWIAT RECENZJI[/url][/h1]
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/26553378/

author: {'steamid': '76561198030788488', 'num_games_owned': 747, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 1371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1371, 'last_played': 1637548206}
review:
[h1]12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature[/h1] ...is a time-based resource management puzzle. Returning from vacation, Hercules and Megara find that the land devastated by drought, and must restore it while facing Hercules' doppelganger.

[h1]⚙ [u]Game Description & Mechanics[/u] ⚙[/h1]
Your goal is to gather food, wood and gold to open paths, fix bridges and overpass several obstacles to achieve specific goals. You can pick up resources on the map, on various spawn points, from cleared obstacles or by exchanging it for other resources from various allies. Each level will also have a hidden puzzle piece, unlocking bonus levels.

Score is awarded based on how much time you have left when you successfully complete the level. Therefore, the challenge is in clearing the various obstacles in the correct order, with quick thinking and quick clicking. Wasting resources at the wrong place means you'll waste time waiting on resource spawning to proceed further.

Part of the strategy relies on investing resources on the right improvement, at the right time. Improve farms for more food, workshops for more wood, mines for more gold and your home for more servants. Improving them, of course, costs resources, so choosing which one to improve and when will affect your progress. You also get access to various abilities (different for each level) to boost worker speed, gather more resources or stop time.

[h1]☺ [u]What I enjoyed[/u] ☺[/h1]
While the fourth iteration of the game, I found the level design more challenging, and this is a good thing, because the whole point of the game is to get a 3-star rating everywhere. Most of the replayability will come from playing the same level multiple time to improve your score, with every second you save getting you closer to your goal.

There's a nice variety of obstacles to remove with different requirements, accumulated from past games, Sure, your servants remain the main tool to remove obstacles, with the occasional involvement of Hercules or Megara, but many others introduced in past games make a return: you'll need Cerberus against ghosts, Medusa against minotaurs, etc. New allies are also introduced to gather resources: Midas trades gold for other resources, Charon picks up driftwood, etc. The variety actually increases the challenge!

[h1]☹ [u]What bothered me[/u] ☹[/h1]
If you aren't trying get perfect scores, you won't enjoy this game, even as a casual player. It is impossible to fail a level: on-the-map resources are calculated to make sure you can reach the resource spawn points, so there's no way to misspend your resource to a point you'll be stuck. And no matter how long you wait on resource spawning, there is no base time limit for level completion.

Storytelling has never been the focal point of the series, but it feels like they didn't even try with this one. Besides a short cutscene every 10 levels, most of the levels themselves don't really tell a story, at least not as much as the previous games did. You might go through all 10 levels with no actual progression, and with no effect on gameplay. For instance: [spoiler]When Hercules and Megara are separated, the game simply substitute saplings for stoned saplings, and boulders for titan's teeth,[/spoiler] which cancels any gameplay change this could've introduced.

[h1][b]My Verdict[/b]: ★★★☆☆ - [i]"It's up to you."[/i][/h1]

Sure, it's the same basic gameplay, graphics and soundtrack as the previous game, but that's exactly what's wanted by the target audience. This is not so much a sequel as it is a standalone extra level pack for those that enjoyed the previous iterations. If you've never played them, start with the first [I][url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/342580]12 Labours of Hercules[/url][/I] and work your way to this one if you like the genre.

—————————————————————————
[i][b]This was just my opinion.[/b]

If you found this review helpful, please consider giving it a thumbs up, and feel free to check out more of my (purely opinionated) [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/CJsOpinions/]reviews[/url].[/i]

review: É um jogo de controle de recursos (lembra um pouco aqueles jogos de tabuleiro) onde você deve ir cumprindo os objetivos de cada fase para poder seguir adiante. Apesar de ser um jogo bem simples, possui gráficos bem desenhados e bem coloridos, jogabilidade bem intuitiva e uma dificuldade fácil / moderada (parece um jogo pra crianças). Apesar de ter várias fases, infelizmente depois de algum tempo ele enjoa um pouco. Vale a pena se estiver barato. Nota 5/10. Recomendo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198033910034', 'num_games_owned': 3900, 'num_reviews': 555, 'playtime_forever': 443, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 443, 'last_played': 1614410345}
review:
Highly recommended for casual time management fans.

Another great installment in the 12 Labours of Hercules series. If you are new to these games, then you might want to start with the first one, but it doesn't really matter. This continues to expand on what makes the previous games a lot of fun. This time there are some additional bonus levels that you unlock from collecting the puzzle pieces and then putting together a simple jigsaw puzzle. The story was a bit lacking this time around and sometimes it would hang up briefly when starting the game, but other than that, you are getting a great value for the asking price.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987468538', 'num_games_owned': 1409, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 349481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299179, 'last_played': 1705240071}
review: The legendary hero Hercules and his wife Megara are back, ready to embark on their next adventure! The Gods are outraged at their defeat and have summoned a fearsome beast who can match Hercules's god-like strength. The beast has trampled the countryside, turning lush gardens into desert wastelands! Restore the world's beauty by using everything at your disposal, from Megara's magical abilities to even a fire hydrant! Team up with friendly allies like King Midas and Epeius with his famous Trojan Horse to save Mother Nature from destruction.

author: {'steamid': '76561198325667092', 'num_games_owned': 1432, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1539610150}
review: 喜加一

author: {'steamid': '76561198048842929', 'num_games_owned': 2402, 'num_reviews': 463, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1608729587}
review:
[h1]Review verfasst am 23.12.2020[/h1]

Auch der vierte Teil weiß zu überzeugen, sofern man die Vorgänger und das Spielprinzip mag. Es gibt eine neue Story, mehr als 50 Levels, da es noch die Bonuslevels gibt und einen passenden, abwechslungsreichen Soundtrack. Die Grafik ist auch gefühlt schöner als bei den Vorgängern. Bei diesem Teil ist es auch etwas leichter eine Goldwertung zu bekommen. Außerdem gibt es neben den Errungenschaften auch noch Sammelkarten. Das Game ist Zeitlos, es machte 2015 genauso viel Spaß, wie heute. Nach ca. 8 Stunden habe ich das Spiel beendet, hatte meinen Spaß und kann auch den 4 Teil der Serie wärmstens weiterempfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074085825', 'num_games_owned': 4493, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 2491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2491, 'last_played': 1594603090}
review:
This is a must. I have all its predecessors, and think the designer's hit the mark with this sequel.
It has 3 options of difficulty. There are new "secret" challenges in some of the levels. The hidden puzzle pieces are back. The story is worth watching each stage's intro.
I have not quite figured out what about this version makes it a Collector's Edition other than the wallpapers, but I have not finished the game.
If you are a Time Management fan, this and the rest of the series are well worth the credits.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068369219', 'num_games_owned': 3316, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 664, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 664, 'last_played': 1458493616}
review: This series of games is probably the best and most representative for this whole genre of time management games. It has a light story, that sometimes is funny. It has lovable characters that develop from game to game.  It also has nice, easy to master mechanics and on top of it the graphics are nice enough not to be bothersome. The fact that it has challenges just adds to the replayability value. I highly recommend it and any of the game in these series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053049402', 'num_games_owned': 1623, 'num_reviews': 346, 'playtime_forever': 6895, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6895, 'last_played': 1583609373}
review:
В момент, когда я начал играть в серию игр 12 Labours of Hercules было 7 частей и не одна из них не была провальной, все были нормальными с одной и той же задумкой, но разными уровнями и сюжетом. Поиграл во все 7 частей, но дальше не стал покупать, считаю что первых 3 хватит с головой, чтобы насытиться геймплеем и историями.
Сейчас же 11 часть выходит 18 ноября 2020 года непонятно зачем, ведь вы можете заметить, что каждая последующая часть становится менее популярной и с 4-ой части в них играет очень мало людей. В общем то конвейер, который ещё не скатился, но по крайней мере стал непопулярным.
Поиграть можно в любую часть, но рано или поздно в эти игры надоест играть. На распродажах стоят они все дёшево, поэтому и закупил все части, что были, ибо по 15 рублей игры с карточками и достижениями хорошо заходят любому человеку, особенно те, в которые приятно поиграть. 
[h1] Внимание! Карточки есть в I, II, III, IV, V, VI частях. [/h1]
Плюсы есть, ну а минусов пока что нет особых. Цена - качество оправданы. Не так часто встречаешь игры дешевле 100 руб., в которые приятно играть.
Хронология отсутствует, поэтому можно играть в любую из частей. Каждая из игр представляет разные истории (арки).

author: {'steamid': '76561198048979350', 'num_games_owned': 878, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 836, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 686, 'last_played': 1603711869}

author: {'steamid': '76561198248280064', 'num_games_owned': 2913, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1603016038}
review: Les 12 Travaux d'Hercule IV: Mère Nature est un jeu de gestion de temps et de craft dans lequel les vieux ennemis d'Hercule se liguent pour se venger. Avec l'aide de sa femme Mégara et de ses amis, il va devoir sauver Mère Nature de la destruction. C'est un bon jeu, qui reprend les mêmes mécaniques de gameplay que les précédents, tout en y apportant à chaque fois, des petites nouveautés.

review: Une recette qui marche toujours aussi bien en nous proposant un agréable moment de détente. Toutefois, cet opus est légèrement plus corsé que les précédents si vous visez tous les succès car battre le record des développeurs peut s'avérer assez pénible sur certains niveaux. Ce titre reste un passe-temps divertissant et sympathique qui vous occupera l'espace de quelques heures, donc ne vous privez pas si vous accrochez à un jeu de ce style.

author: {'steamid': '76561198222676772', 'num_games_owned': 1224, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 789, 'last_played': 1516454264}
review:
[h1]Этот обзор - моё личное мнение!

ОПИСАНИЕ[/h1]

Перед нами очередная часть серии игр про Геракла (Геркулеса), и на самом деле ничего в игре не изменилось: все тот сбор ресурсов, нахождение кусочков пазлов, строительство сооружений, и т.д., но к слову сказать есть и небольшие изменения, а именно система обмена ресурсами, не очень полезная, но в некоторых ситуациях поможет быстрее закончить уровень.
Как и у любой другой игры в этой есть как плюсы, так и минусы. 
К плюсам можно отнести простоту, приятную рисованную картинку, неплохую музыку и несложные достижения. 
К минусам я для себя отнес - это не меняющийся геймплей, долгое время на прохождение (примерно 10 часов), однообразность от уровня к уровню

[h1]ИТОГ[/h1]
Игра подойдет для тех, кто любит простые и незамысловатые игры и посидеть вечерком пару часиков отвлечься от всякой суеты
Моя оценка 5.5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977536331', 'num_games_owned': 2816, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 1040, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1040, 'last_played': 1468251737}
review:
STORIA: Simpatica, un'altra allegra avventura con Ercole e i suoi compari.
GAMEPLAY: Casual, strategico, azione con raccolta di risorse.
GRAFICA: Bella, molto dettagliata in stile cartoon con degli ottimi intermezzi.
SONORO: Belle le musiche di accompagnamento mai noiose.
CONTROLLER: Consigliato mouse e tastiera.
DURATA: Circa 10 ore per il completamento di tutti gli achievement, dipende anche molto da quante volte dovete ripetere i livelli per raggiungere le fatidiche 3 stelle.
RUN COMPLETAMENTO: Una, si tratta alla fine solo di rigiocare i livelli per completare quello che si è lasciato indietro.
COMMENTO: Pur essendo un casual game gli sviluppatori hanno prestato particolare attenzione ai dettagli e reso ogni livello unico pur mantenendo le stesse meccaniche di gioco. Livello di sfida sempre adeguato e lungo il giusto per non stancare. Consigliato per quei momenti dove si hanno solo 10 minuti - mezz'ora ma si vuole giocare comunque a qualcosa di stimolante e divertente. 
Se vi è piaciuto il primo troverete appagante anche questo, se di contro siete stufi o non volete un altro "more of the same" allora cercate altro.
Il voto è leggeremente più basso ma solamente perchè non ci sono state novità di sorta in questo capitolo.
VOTO: 80/100

review: El juego es muy entretenido, como todos los de su saga. Es un juego para pasar esos ratos en que no quieres pensar en nada. Visualmente esta muy bien y el sonido es agradable. Lo recomiendo para todas las edades y para mejorar la agudeza visual y estar atento a los detalles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068333743', 'num_games_owned': 228, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1592832695}
review:
Мне нравилась эта серия игр за ненавязчивый геймплей, за возможность отвлечься от игры на сколько угодно времени, а потом продолжить без натужных попыток вспомнить о чем игра и как в нее играть, за легкие достижения.
Но в погоне за удержанием интереса игроков разработчики выбрали странный путь - усложнение процесса получения достижений и полное сохранение геймплея. А я бы предпочла новые фишки, новые истории, новых героев и легкие достижения. Поэтому наши дорожки с этой серией игр отныне расходятся в разные стороны.
Ах, да. Появившиеся баги с получением достижений тоже сыграли свою роль.
Рекомендую только первую часть.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064116127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1894, 'last_played': 1709760141}
review: I like this installment because of its graphical side, the nature aspect is a nice touch for the game which is otherwise basically the same as the previous ones (as always). On the other hand, it has the most annoying game features so far - evil Hercules and constant hints which end like in a half of the game when you are quite sure what to do and when and do not want an intrusive guide.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132995625', 'num_games_owned': 1414, 'num_reviews': 754, 'playtime_forever': 575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1588943410}
review:
12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature (Platinum Edition)
4/9 Gelegenheitsspiel von 2015 

Der legendäre Herkules ist zurück. Zusammen mit seiner geliebten Frau Megara stürzt sich unser Held in sein nächstes Abenteuer! Die Götter grollen ob ihrer Niederlage und erschaffen eine furchterregende Kreatur, die es mit Herkules göttergleicher Stärke aufnehmen kann. Das Biest hat das ganze Land verwüstet und die blühenden Gärten in vertrocknete Einöden verwandelt. Stelle die alte Pracht, mit allem was Dir zur Verfügung steht, wieder her - seien es Megaras magische Fähigkeiten oder nur ein einfacher Hydrant. Verbünde Dich mit Epeius und seinem Trojanischen Pferd oder dem freundlichen König Midas, um die Natur vor der Zerstörung zu retten. Soweit zum Inhalt.
Der vierte Teil ist bislang der beste meiner ansicht nach.
Hat ein sehr ausgeglichenen Schwierigkeitsgrad und der Spaßfaktor ist höher als bei den anderen.
Von daher, meine extra Empfehlung für euch für diese Serie.

Hier findet ihr meine Gruppe und mein Archiv mit zur Zeit fast 1.000 Reviews. Viel Spaß beim stöbern.

12 Laboratories of Hercules IV: Mother Nature (Platinum Edition)
4/9 casual game from 2015

The legendary Hercules is back. Together with his beloved wife Megara, our hero embarks on his next adventure! The gods resent their defeat and create a fearsome creature that can compete with Hercules of godlike strength. The beast has devastated the whole country and turned the blooming gardens into dry wastes. Restore the old splendor with everything you have available - be it Megara's magical abilities or just a simple hydrant. Team up with Epeius and his Trojan horse or the friendly King Midas to save nature from destruction. So much for the content.
The fourth part is the best so far in my opinion.
Has a very balanced level of difficulty and the fun factor is higher than the others.
Therefore, my special recommendation for you for this series.

review:
結論言うと、面白いです。

ボス戦が無くなってしまい過去作含めシリーズ最低になってしまいましたが、ま～シリーズとしては良くも悪くもいつも通りです。
手抜き感は否めないですが興味が有ればプレイしても損は無いと思います。

そこそこオススメです。

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198260331341', 'num_games_owned': 937, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1553836632}
review:
3/10 (long story short) It's an easy achievement clunky casual game with no mythology.

12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature (Platinum Edition) is nothing special and isn't as grand as the title might lead some to believe. I played about 10 hours and got all 22 achievements and at times it was hard for me to bring myself to continue playing because it was pretty boring. It has minimal mythology and, from what I've seen, is a copy paste of the previous titles. Granted I haven't played the previous ones. Hard to invest in and has little replay value. My takeaway:

[u]Pros[/u]
[list]
    [*]Good Message
    [*]Fun Quick Casual Gameplay
    [*]Easy 100%
    [*]Does Require (Some) Strategy
[/list]

[u]Cons[/u]
[list]
    [*]Fire Hydrants In Ancient Rome
    [*]Little Story
    [*]Little Soundtrack
    [*]Downright Annoying Sounds
    [*]Time Consuming
    [*]Just Like Every Other Title
    [*]Not Challenging
    [*]Cringy Script
    [*]Just A Bad Paid Game
[/list]

[spoiler]To win just point and click click click click click click click click click[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198030183813', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1569634636}
review:
Selamlar,

[table]
[tr]
[h1][th]OYNANIŞ[/th][/h1]
 [/tr]
[/table]

12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature serinin dördüncü oyunudur.
Temelde Mother Nature önceki oyunlardan farksız. 
Eski oyunlara göre mantık aynı 
Tesislerin inşası, tamiri, yolların onarılması, kaynakların toplanması ve zaman zaman ıssız topraklarda ağaç yetiştirmek için ağır kayaların Herkül tarafından yollardan kaldırılması. 
Mother Nature'da iki adet işçimiz var ve görevleri hızlı bir şekilde sıraya koyarak verebiliyorsunuz geri kalanı onlar yapıyor.
Her 10 bölümde bir gizlenmiş mozaik parçaları mevcut eğer onları toplarsanız en sonunda bir mozaik resmi açmış olacaksınız.
Mother Nature'da seçilebilecek üç farklı zorluk ayarı var ; 
Relaxed, Casual ve Expert 
Hangi modda oynamaya karar verirseniz verin, 12 Hercules IV Labors zor bir oyun. 
Oyunun zorluğu ilk seviyeden son seviyeye gayet güzel bir şekilde aktarılmış. 


[table]
[tr]
[h1][th]HİKAYE[/th][/h1]
 [/tr]
[/table]

Tanrıların arasında kıskançlık yayılmıştır ve Herkülü zehirlemeye çalışırlar.
Başarısızlıkla sonuçlanan olay sonucunda Herkül iyileşir ve daha güçlüdür. 
Tanrıların ortalığa saldığı canavarlar kırsal bölgeyi ezip geçer. 
Herkül ve karısı Megara'nın  kırsal bölgeyi restore etmeleri gerekir.

[table]
[tr]
[h1][th]GRAFİK[/th][/h1]
 [/tr]
[/table]

Muhteşem bir grafik olmasa da, fena bir deneyim sunmuyor. 
Sanat, parlak renkler ve basit görsellerle karikatürize edilmiş.
Animasyonlar şaşırtıcı derecede güzel ve pürüzsüz. 

[table]
[tr]
[h1][th]SES[/th][/h1]
 [/tr]
[/table]

Müzikleri biraz hayal kırıklığı yaratıyor. 
Oyunda birkaç seviye geçtikten sonra oyun sesini kapatıp sevdiğiniz bir playlist açacağınza bahse girerim.

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Konu[/th]
        [th]Puan[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Oynanış[/td]
        [td]75[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Hikaye[/td]
        [td]50[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Grafik[/td]
        [td]50[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Ses[/td]
        [td]25[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

İyi eğlenceler :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198356141989', 'num_games_owned': 2521, 'num_reviews': 637, 'playtime_forever': 4487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4234, 'last_played': 1597776376}
review:
Back with Hercules after the third chapter dedicated to women, this game follows exactly the same footsteps set down by 12 Labours of Hercules II and III.
The first chapter had some minor differences (mainly the auto-recharging resources with time: food, wood and gold - here, and in the previous chapters, you have to constantly collect them), but this one is really the same of the previous ones.
And it's awesome.
It's essentially a point and click game: you'll have dozens of levels in which there will be some tasks to complete - build something, clear the paths, destroy some enemies and such.
In order to do so, the whole map will always be filled with things to collect, buildings to create and to upgrade, enemies to defeat, thieves and so on..
This game keeps the relax mode along with the normal and hard ones, it has an awesome timer system and it poses a real challenge - you'll have for each single map to value each single movement to do, since concentrating only on one side of the task will maybe put you in a total shortage of wood or gold, leading to seconds in which you won't be able to do anything.
It's a great game like the whole series - if you like point and click adventures, this one's for you too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198184897393', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 653, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 594, 'last_played': 1562353701}
review:
The fourth entry in this time-management series. It does add a few new gameplay elements this time around, but it still gets tedious - especially with a 5th section (56 scenes total, plus 5 jigsaw-like "puzzles").  Designed for (and probably easier to play on) a touchscreen, I can only recommend this if you really like this genre with a keyboard and mouse.

author: {'steamid': '76561198219343843', 'num_games_owned': 16124, 'num_reviews': 312, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 961, 'last_played': 1560229925}
review:
Fourth of the titular Greek Mythos time management series, [b]12 Labours IV[/b] returns with everything the previous installment did, save for some cosmetic variations on the same core mechanics. Fans of the genre will enjoy more content, but some may grow weary of its increasingly cut and paste design.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
+ Beautiful artwork
+ More variety of background music
+ Difficulty selection, developer score challenge
+ Jigsaw Puzzle collectibles which unlock an additional 6 stages
+ Multiple routes for strategic planning and good AI pathing
+ Stuck? Check guides for each level to show you intended solutions and hidden objects
+ Good length for its low price; 56 stages

[h1]Cons[/h1]
- Unlike the original, no minigames to be found besides the Jigsaws. Boss stages haven't returned.
- Repeated copyright free music that has appeared in every game so far
- The story is even more nonsensical than the last; feels forced for the sake of making another game.
- Silly anachronisms like fire hydrants & submarines in ancient Greece?

[i]Herc IV[/i] is a well made casual game, make no mistake. But I found myself rushing to complete it as i became overwhelmed by deja vu from prior installments. The only actual addition to this episode was hidden objects, yet their score-centric purpose makes them easily skippable and only account for a few stages in total. I really miss the minigames from the original that accentuated the world segments... maybe bosses will return someday? One can only hope.

[u]Achievement Hunters[/u]: Simple to 100%, with two potential hangups. First, developer times require the highest difficulty and leave little room for error. Luckily there are level guides to show you the sequence, and with practice you can cut corners to shave seconds and come out ahead. Don't forget the nowhere-explained bonus points from clicking flying birds, that just might put you over the edge for the win. Earlier stages are some of the easiest.

Second, anti-theft is best tackled in 2.8, with the caveat that you don't build out unnecessary resource generators that thieves would be able to reach. Ignore half the stage and slowly build the exit bridge. You'll go way over the gold time limit but you'll complete the challenge.

Happy hunting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329283449', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1558711299}
review:
For those completionists like me, getting that "beat 10 developer records" achievement is much easier than I found it to be in the third game of the series. I played on expert until I got the achievement and only really needed to go through the 1st and part of the 2nd chapters by putting in minimal effort. I'm certain someone actually trying hard could probably knock it out earlier and then could get through the rest of it on casual easily. 

That difference is what makes this version far more enjoyable to go through in comparison to the slog it felt like the third could be at times. Very good if you have a game you just want to knock out super quickly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198251529466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 945, 'last_played': 1672540840}

author: {'steamid': '76561198078049022', 'num_games_owned': 821, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1620962388}
review:
Cuarta entrega de la saga, muy similar a las versiones anteriores, se presenta de manera time manager, es juego casual, adictivo y divertido.
Es un juego donde debes restaurar árboles, jardines, caminos, entre otras cosas. Existen 3 modos de dificultad relajado, informal y experto, siendo este último un verdadero reto. Cada nivel se completa dentro del tiempo que es otorgado dando una puntuación de 1 a 3 estrellas y se ira revelando una parte del castillo.
Todos los niveles tienen piezas de rompecabezas, y los mismos son rejugable para mejorar la puntuación o para encontrar esas piezas que no pudiste hacer a la primera. 
Durante el juego tus obreros deberán construir y mejorar las instalaciones para ir pasando los niveles y a medida que vamos avanzando iremos recibiendo bonificaciones que se pueden usar cada vez que el medidor se llene para hacer que los trabajadores sean más rápidos y recolecten más recursos. 
Tiene 50 niveles, Héroes Legendarios, y unas cuantas horas de juego.

Es una buena adquisición siempre y cuando sea de sale o bundle. En cuanto a gráficos, sonidos, musicalización, no tengo mucho para aportar, es óptimo a lo que ofrece el juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198393315345', 'num_games_owned': 10691, 'num_reviews': 666, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1638575262}

author: {'steamid': '76561198259704545', 'num_games_owned': 795, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 501, 'last_played': 1463250597}
review:
Игры этой серии мне понравились. Хорошая картинка, легко залипнуть до полого прохождения со всеми достижениями. Интересно решать задачу по распределению времени на 3 звезды, вот только от кликов устаешь. 

Проходил игры этой серии довольно давно и поэтому довольно сложно выделить отличительные особенности каждой игры. Да на самом деле их не так уж и много поэтому обзор будет продублирован на каждую игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027286434', 'num_games_owned': 1715, 'num_reviews': 1363, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1552680313}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1552894983}
review:
Yet another 12 Labours of Hercules clicker game ported from tablet.   Click things randomly on the screen to progress through the levels.  No meaningful decisions or gameplay involved. 

This belongs on tablet and it should have stayed there.   $4.50 for something less than half the price on the app stores.  The only mystery is why there are so many cookie cutter sequels to this series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051861334', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 1035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1035, 'last_played': 1546299670}
review:
Kolejna odsłona z serii 12 Labours of Hercules. Wbrew pozorom to całkiem niezła gra strategiczna - jeżeli gramy nie na poziomie relaks - w przeciwnym wypadku to typowy zabijacz czasu. Jednakże kolejne odsłony tej pozycji nie wnoszą wiele nowego do rozgrywki..

Plusy :
[list]
    [*]Przyjemna "malowana" grafika 
    [*]Oprawa dźwiękowa nie razi ani nie zachwyca - na zadowalającym poziomie
    [*]50 poziomów podstawowych, 5 układanek i 6 poziomów dodatkowych
    [*]3 poziomy trudności
    [*]22 osiągnięcia STEAM
[/list]

Minusy :
[list]
    [*]Do diabła z tymi złodziejami.. idzię się poirytować 
    [*]Po kilku kolejnych częściach lekkie znudzenie..
[/list]

review: The next iteration in this series presents a more substantial update to the game, when compared to the first two sequels.. It's still the same simple, fun gameplay beneath the trivial enhancements.. and still very easy.

review:
More Herculean fun! Mostly more of the same, with a few new abilities for both Hercules and Megara. Also has five acts instead of four, so you get 25% more strategic goodness.

Runs great on Linux (Mint 18.2).

review:
[code][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33025671-Missi-the-Achievement-Huntress/] Please see my curator page for more games that are worth your time [/url][/code]

Approximate amount of time to 100%: 14 hours
Estimated achievement difficulty: 5/10
Minimum number of playthroughs needed: 1, level selection
Has it been in a bundle: Yes
Is there a good guide available: Yes for the overlord achievement you can find a guide [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=837527201] here [/url]
How many people have complete this game at the time I'm writing this review: 747 on Astats

Multiplayer achievements: No
Missable achievements: No, level selection
Grinding Achievements: Yes, getting the gold reward on every level
DLC-Only achievements: No
Time-gated achievements: No
RNG-achievements: No
Does difficulty affect achievements: Yes, on easy you aren't able to beat the developer's record.
Unobtainable/glitched achievements: No

This is the best "time-management" game series I know. Loved it a lot and completed Game 1 to 5 in a very short time. Looking forward to part 6 and 7.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970068010', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 1114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1114, 'last_played': 1534883435}
review: Einige Level sind im Vergleich zu den Vorgängern leider etwas unübersichtlich geworden. Aber auch hier passt noch der Schwierigkeitsgrad. Die Achievements sind in einer annehmbaren Zeit machbar. Wer Zeitmanagement-Spiele mag, macht mit dem Kauf keinen Fehler.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983700906', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 653, 'last_played': 1534364559}
review:
Un bon petit jeu de détente ... rien de bien difficile ... Quoique un peu plus que les précédents ... Niveau très chargé en terme d'objets donc plus complexe ...

Je me suis juste trouvé à recommencer quelques niveaux car complètement oublié de trouver la pièce de puzzle ou juste pour avoir la troisième étoile ... 

Très coloré, missions variées ... même plus variée que les précédents jeux.

Musique très très répétitive et les sons je n'en parle même pas ...

Temps de jeu environ : 11H

Il vaut son prix.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059334622', 'num_games_owned': 600, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 2459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1686208095}
review: Pretty much the same concept as the 3rd game but now with the addition of in game guides which you can check step-by-step while doing each level. God bless. Unfortunately though, still couldn't beat all the dev scores mainly the last one cause the devs 100000% cheated so whatever lol.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101204245', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 10513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6795, 'last_played': 1585981838}
review: Every iteration of this game raises the difficulty level, so the game grows with you to keep challenging you as you play through the series.  It's a pretty remarkable achievement in casual gaming, I think.  This game gets a level of care that you don't expect in simple clicker games.  Can't recommend the whole series enough.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997518664', 'num_games_owned': 2644, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 1059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1059, 'last_played': 1528670873}
review:
Эта часть уже чуть больше отличается от предыдущих: сменилась часть музыки и её стало чуть больше, добавились новые геймплейные элементы и решения, стало заметно развитие серии.
Но в целом это всё тот же качественный представитель полюбившейся мне серии игр жанра тайм-менеджмента. Если вам такие нравятся - берите смело, планку ребята подняли ещё чуть выше.
Как я уже писал в обзоре на предыдущую часть, в игры этой серии может играть даже ребёнок (от 3,5 лет). Чтоб проиграть тут надо очень постараться, поэтому ребёнок может просто сидеть, нажимать на доступные действия и рано или поздно пройдёт уровень.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982920009', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 1003, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1003, 'last_played': 1490011496}
review:
Same review for all the games in this series as they are all 95% the same.

Very basic, the the point where you think its target audience are children. Enjoyable at first, gets awefully reptitive if you play through all four games which I have. Very simple point and click timer challenge game that isn't a challenge, from what I remember they throw skills at you pretty early one like "double servent speed" which on some maps is crazy OP. The story is linear, sounds again like something out of a book you'd find in the childrens corner of a library. Colourful and interative..... 

Ok thats it, this mustve been made for kids, if you ain't a kid or of a simple mind like myself then you'll regret buying it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198190380543', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 603, 'playtime_forever': 527, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1528019800}
review: This fourth time the 12 Labours of Hercules series on Steam presents us with a Platinum Edition, which includes more levels (there’s now 56 in total) and a neat strategy guide in-game. There’s also a few additions to the gameplay, without changing the formula. It’s still basically a copy-paste of the previous games, but this time the game manages to be a sequel with more and revamped content. I like these games, they’re easy to play, hard to master, and have colorful art. Although this is just more of the same, it’s more of the same good stuff. If you enjoyed the other titles, you won’t be disappointed with this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977197768', 'num_games_owned': 3607, 'num_reviews': 459, 'playtime_forever': 980, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 980, 'last_played': 1527939600}
review:
Mother Nature est le quatrième volet de la série des "12 labours of Hercules", comme pour les précédents il est composé de 4 lieux qui comportent 10 niveaux chacun et si on ajoute un niveau bonus par lieu cela donne 44 niveaux.

Effectivement, beaucoup de personnes trouvent qu' entre le 1 et le 4, il n'y a pas beaucoup de changement de gameplay. Pour autant, personnellement, je retrouve toujours les nouvelles aventures de Mégara et Hercules avec plaisir et cette série reste à mon avis l'une des meilleures que ce soit en terme de "management des ressources" ou des graphismes. 

Et d'ailleurs, j'achète ce genre de jeu non pas parce qu'il change en permanence de jouabilité mais bien au contraire parce que je sais que je n'aurais pas de souci sur la façon de jouer ni que cela me prendra 3 heures pour faire un niveau.

C'est simple, pas compliqué à jouer et on peux facilement trouver un peu de temps pour faire un niveau ou deux par jour.... Alors inutile de bouder son plaisir.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980796094', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 435, 'playtime_forever': 780, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 780, 'last_played': 1491331274}
review:
I enjoyed this whole series of games and finished all of them. It's usually a challenging experience to get all the extra achievements and it can get really hectic for some three star ratings. Time management games need a lot of charm to be compelling enough. This one does, giving us a goofey greek mythology based story and some mythological allies. You need to like this particular genre to like anything about the game, but if you do, you're not going wrong with the Labors of Hercules.

This is the fourth installment with minor changes of mechanics, but at the core, it is the same game.

Follow my curator at https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28337205-Fair-Minded-Witness/

author: {'steamid': '76561197997740965', 'num_games_owned': 8003, 'num_reviews': 2015, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1526908224}
review:
Приветствую, вот и добрался до титров 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature. Что же можно сказать про это чудо игростроя. 
 Ну перед нами все тот же 12 Labours of Hercules, но с припиской 4 в названии. Играть все еще очень весело и реально затягивает. Выключить после прохождения очередного уровня очень трудно. Но у игры появились очень неприятные моменты (Для меня лично). Если ранее сюжеты данных игр можно было понять и с долькой юмора за ними следить, то 4 часть просто высосала свой сюжет из пальца. Высосала настолько, что это как Saints Row на фоне серии гта. Помогаем Гераклу! Бить гидранты, закапывать нефтяные лужи и иные вещи современного мира. Ну не знаю, я тут на подвиги Геракла пришел глянуть, а не грибы есть.
 Если отпустить мыслительный кризис сценаристов, то играть все еще весело. Нововведений как всегда мало, но разработчики нашли золотую схему для подобного развлечения. Щупают новые фишки и просто не хотят сломать весь кайф. Это конечно замечательно, но к четвертой игре уже надоедает. Я уже хочу чего-нибудь новенького от серии, а впереди еще как минимум три игры данной серии. 
 Еще могу отметить музыкальное сопровождение. Это смешно, но его можно похвалить только за то, что оно начало менять свои треки. Да, друзья, в первых трех играх был только один трек (Вообще один на три игры). 
 В итоге могу без задних мыслей советовать тем ребятам, кто прошел первые игры серии и хочет навернуть еще. На данный момент самая слабая часть приключений силача. Посмотрим что будет дальше, а вам приятной игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035094289', 'num_games_owned': 4896, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 829, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 829, 'last_played': 1453354237}
review:
The 12 Labours of Hercules games are all "time management" games, but for those who hate feeling pressured by time, you can just enjoy the game and ignore the clock. You won't get "gold time," but the game will let you play each board to completion. You can come back later and go for the gold if you want.
These games are colorful, and just fun; nothing too challenging really, and the story isn't going to have you biting your nails in anticipation or dread. It's just fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083754515', 'num_games_owned': 6676, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 2741, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2455, 'last_played': 1453250386}
review:
[h1][u]The following review applies to all games from the "12 Labours of Hercules" series.[/u] Even though they have different themes, they all have the same gameplay style and overall quality.[/h1]

[b]The "12 Labours of Hercules" series has extremely captivating resource-management games, with beautiful and enjoyable graphics, sound effects and soundtrack.[/b] Even though they are casual games, they offer some challenge if played in difficult mode. [b]The achievements are relatively easy to get[/b] - by the time you finish the game, you'll probably have gotten them all, or at least have just a couple to complete.

An interesting factor is that [b]with each new title in the series the developers seem to add and improve game mechanics.[/b] Although they have a "background story”, the narrative is very simple and each title has its own theme, so [b]there is no need to play them in any specific order.[/b]

[b]The cost benefit of the games is very good, since in addition to all having cards, they are also pretty cheap.[/b] So far there are 7 games in the series, costing $ 2.99 each or $ 16.73 for the complete pack. Since most of them have been in several bundles and frequent sales, it is quite easy to get them for less than "full price".

[i]*Personally, I recommend buying the complete pack during the big sales (Summer Sale and Winter Sale, around June and December), and you don’t even need to pay the full price if you already have some of the games.[/i]


[quote][b][i]PORTUGUÊS[/i][/b][/quote]

[h1][u]A análise abaixo se aplica a todos os jogos da série “12 Labours of Hercules”.[/u] Apesar de terem temas diferentes, todos possuem o mesmo estilo de jogo e qualidade geral.[/h1]

[b]A série “12 Labours of Hercules” contém jogos de gerenciamento de recursos extremamente cativantes, com gráficos, efeitos e trilha sonora bonitos e agradáveis.[/b] Mesmo sendo jogos casuais, oferecem certo desafio se jogados no modo difícil. [b]As conquistas são relativamente fáceis de conseguir[/b] – quando você terminar o jogo, provavelmente o terá “platinado”, ou terá apenas uma ou outra conquista para alcançar.  

Um fator interessante é que [b]a cada novo título da série os desenvolvedores parecem adicionar e melhorar mecânicas de jogo.[/b] Apesar de terem uma história de “pano de fundo”, a narrativa é bem simples e cada título tem seu próprio tema, então [b]não há necessidade de jogá-los em uma ordem específica.[/b] 

[b]O custo benefício dos jogos é muito bom, pois além de todos terem cartas, também são bem baratinhos.[/b] Até o momento existem 7 jogos na série, custando R$ 6,29 cada, ou R$ 35,21 o pacote completo. Como quase todos estiveram em vários bundles e promoções frequentes, é bem fácil consegui-los por um valor menor que o “preço cheio”. 

[i]*Pessoalmente recomendo comprar o pacote completo durante as grandes promoções (Promoção de Verão e Promoção de Inverno, no meio e no fim do ano), com a vantagem de não precisar pagar o valor integral caso já possua alguns dos jogos.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198120530775', 'num_games_owned': 3399, 'num_reviews': 342, 'playtime_forever': 808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 808, 'last_played': 1520644579}
review:
Nice game. Is very relaxed and funny. There's some strategy involved. Is just like the previous Hercules games with a few novelties. Finished it in about 12 hours, but you can do it in a lot less or a lot more if you change the difficulty or if you're not trying for the achivements.

No bugs found. Works fine on win 7.

Is usually very cheap and it has cards and easy to get achivements.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015774285', 'num_games_owned': 631, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1475403852}
review:
Покупал первые 3 части по 3 руб за штуку ради фарма карточек, игры понравились, на картах наварился все збс,  даже эту купил за 13 руб, карточками есстественно не отбил, сейчас первые 3 части стоят 15 руб, а эта 23 руб, это я к тому, что игру похоже покупают фанаты код, нфс и других конвееров, помоему разрабы зажрались, если раньше эта игра была приятным фармом карточек который запускаешь, не для идла, то теперь это просто конвеер одной и той же игры с очень бредовым сюжетом 
Если думаешь покупать или нет, дам простой лафхак, перепройди 1 часть т.к. изменений почти нету
И еще кое что, какой он подвиг то тут сделал ? Что то я не помню подвиг под названием высидел яйцо динозавра,  Лежал в гамаке пока рабы бегали за хавкой? я так каждый день делаю где игра про меня?  Дал люля злому двойнику? подвинул камень? Приказал страшной бабе напугать черноопого рогача?

author: {'steamid': '76561198098342214', 'num_games_owned': 10629, 'num_reviews': 595, 'playtime_forever': 752, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 752, 'last_played': 1517089727}
review:
[h1]12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature é um jogo puzzle que não muda nada tão significativo de sua gameplay em relação aos seus antecessores [/h1]

Igual nos jogos anteriores eu recomendo esse jogo para quem quer um jogo curto e agradável de se jogar e também interesse em pode pegar 100% de conquistas ou pelo menos quase todas que seria o meu caso, só compre esse jogo quem estiver interessado no seguimento da história e principalmente pra quem quiser adquirir mais conquistas Steam pois tirando esses detalhes não vi tantas diferenças assim que poderia vir a justificar uma compra nova.

Há uma diferença entretanto que é em relação ao seu antecessor que é bastante desafiador, pois nesse jogo a conquista de bater o recorde do desenvolvedor 10 vezes é bem mais desafiante sendo que no jogo anterior o jogador poderia pegar a conquista de 10 recordes na verdade com apenas 5 recordes mas nesse dessa vez aparentemente não tem como fugir pois dessa vez precisa realmente superar os 10 recordes o que elevou a díficuldade da conquista, então eu acredito que pra quem tem bastante tempo de poder jogar os jogos do Hercules e gosta de um desafio irá certamente conseguir 100% das conquistas após superar os 10 recordes então pra quem for comprar esteja avisado que apesar de não haver nenhuma mudança significativa nesse mas só apenas uma história nova e o esforço em adquirir as conquistas podem vir a valer o preço da compra que é relativamente bem barato.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965215862', 'num_games_owned': 4216, 'num_reviews': 525, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1484058845}
review:
[h1]🎮 [u]12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature[/u] 🎮[/h1]

Vierter Teil der [url=http://store.steampowered.com/bundle/5893/12_Labours_of_Hercules_7in1_Bundle/]Sieben[/url] aus dem Hause von [url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Jetdogs%20Studios]Jetdogs Studio[/url] und [url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Zoom%20Out%20Games]Zoom Out Games[/url]. Alles beim Alten möchte ich vorweg schicken. Naja nicht ganz!

[b]Veränderungen bzw. Neuerungen[/b]

Es bleibt bei den 40 Leveln plus den fünf Bonusleveln. Dieses Mal bahnt man sich seinen Weg als Herkules und Megara. Dabei sind die Tooltipps dieses Mal sogar hilfreich, wobei man sie als geübter Spieler der Reihe nicht mehr benötigt. Mit Portalen und neuen Items hat man auch kleine Veränderungen an der Mechanik hinzugefügt, wobei das wesentliche Element eigentlich das ist, dass man Rohstoffe nicht mehr farmt sondern quasi erzeugt. Daher auch der Name "Mother Nature". Zwar ist das Bezwingen der Entwicklerrekorde in seiner Schwierigkeit gesenkt worden und die Schwierigkeit scheint insgesamt gesunken zu sein, in Anbetracht dessen dass man das Gold-Level jedoch nur noch im fortgeschrittenen Modus oder höher erreicht, allerdings eine zu verschmerzende Änderung. Die versteckten Puzzleteile sind auch wieder schwieriger zu finden und für eine Errungenschaften behilft man sich am besten per [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1274983040]Guide[/url]. Grafisch gab es keine Veränderungen, musikalisch eine kleine Repertoierweiterung was die Trackanzahl anbelangt. 

[b]Fazit[/b]

Es ist weiterhin ein gutes Timemanagement-Gelegenheitsspiel und man hat, im Vergleich zum direkten Vorgänger, wieder zu alter Form gefunden. Das ist erfreulich!  Das Spiel eignet sich nach wie vor für kleinere Kinder unter 8 Jahren. Mit 95% Rabatt konnte man das Spiel schon für 0,14€ bei Steam erwerben, da macht man nichts falsch. Es ist aber auch seine 2,99€ wert.
[i]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Xeeran/recommended/342580/]Mein Review zu Teil 1[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Xeeran/recommended/360640/]Mein Review zu Teil 2[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198130932508', 'num_games_owned': 1226, 'num_reviews': 724, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1477547900}
review:
[h1]Мать-природа[/h1]

12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature – уже четвертая часть похождений Геракла.
Сразу стоит сказать, что я не рекомендую данную игру. 

Дело в том, что прохождение всей игры занимает порядка 10 часов. Итого, мы имеем, 10 часов на первую часть (которая несомненно зашла), 10 часов на вторую и третью (уже не так весело). И вот, четвертая часть. А на момент написания обзора уже вышла пятая, и выходит шестая часть. И ладно, если бы эти 10 часов тратились на что-то новое, но нет же.  Каждая часть, по сути, это повторение предыдущей, с небольшими изменениями (например, добавление нового объекта или новой карты).

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Игра по сути неплоха. Но если таких игр выпустить тысячу, будет как-то не очень.  Если до этого вы не играли в серию 12 подвигов, то можете сыграть в данную часть. Палец вниз за конвейерность.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044918687', 'num_games_owned': 1743, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 833, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 833, 'last_played': 1516406146}
review:
Did you play the first three? Did you like the first three? Do you like reasonably easy achievments and cards? 
If you answered yes to any of these questions I would probably recommend it to you, as long as you're ok with more of the same.

Honestly, I'm not sure what else to say. How do you write a review for almost the same game six times?

author: {'steamid': '76561197964248449', 'num_games_owned': 855, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 642, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1560348757}
review:
Käytännössä sama peli kuin ensimmäinenkin, joten laitetaan sama arvostelu:

Yllättävän koukuttava time management / mikä lie -peli. Tarkoituksena tässä on vaan kliksutella erilaisia objekteja kartalla ja katsoa kuinka työläiset tai Herkules suorittavat klikatun asian (noutavat resursseja, rakentavat tarvittavia rakennuksia jne), Kaikki pitää toki tehdä tietyn aikarajan puitteissa. Tai ei kai ole pakko tehdä aikarajan puitteissa, mutta jos haluaa esimerkiksi kerätä kaikista jaksoista kulta-ajan, niin sitten tarvii aika-rajan puitteissa tykitellä. On muuten ihan valehtelematta melko haastavaa vaikeimmalla vaikeustasolla koittaa saada noita kulta-aikoja muutmassa jaksossa. Vaatii ihan rehellistä etukäteen suunnittelua, jotta saa valittua optimaalisimman reitin maaliin. Itse en kyllä suunnitellut vaan kävin läpi hirveän yritys & erehdys -taktiikan, mutta kyllä sitä silläkin tavalla sai opittua mapit aika nopsaan. Hirveintä pelissä on se, kun kulta-aika jää muutaman sekunnin päähän. Työläinen juoksee kohti viimeistä objektia ja samalla hiekka loppuu tiimalasissa. HIRVEÄÄ, mutta ihanan koukuttavaa. Varsinkin siinä vaiheessa kun on joku 5 työläistä käytössä niin on erittäin hyvä meininki, kun koko ajan hektisesti vaan klikkailaan objekteja ja koitetaan pitää kaikki aktiivisesti liikkeessä.

Periaatteessa peli toistaa itseään 40 jakson verran, mutta pitkin peliä tulee aina jotain pientä uutta hahmoa tai rakennusta kehiin, joka pitää mielenkiinnon yllä loppuun asti. Kymmenen jakson välein kehiin heitetään vielä bossi, joka on semmoinen kunnon kliksuttelurampageminigame. Nämä olivat ihan viihdyttäviä, MUTTA, itse pelasin Xpadderin kautta ohjaimella niin välillä sai kyllä olla aika kieli keskellä suuta. Hyvin ohjaimellakin sai pelin täydellisesti läpi, mutta suosittelen hiirtä kuitenkin.

Kaikki muu tilpehööri siinä kartalla on ihan turhaa. Juonidemot on vähän mitä on ja siinähän ne menee, mutta koviin syviin vesiin ei yllättäen upota. Vähän pakolliselta pahalta tuntuu. Kartalle myös palkintona ilmestyvät suuret muinaiset rakennelmat ovat aivan turhia. Ei niitä jaksa tuijotella ja tihrustella. Myöhemmissä osissa (III:sta eteenpäin), tämä on hoidettu tyylikkäämmin, kun kerätään yhtä isoa rakennelmaa.

Ihan kiva peli jos tykkää tämmöisestä näpertämisestä. Yllätyin itse ainakin positiivisesti, koska odotin ihan rehelliesti sanoen jotain ö-luokan mobiilipeliä. Tää on hyvin suunniteltu ja täydellisesti toimiva kokonaisuus. Tuleva klassikko bussin odottelu -genressä.

IV-osa edit:

-Herccu on palannut päähahmoksi. Suurimpana uutuutena on tuo "paha" Herkules-kopio, joka tulee aina välillä kartalle seisomaan. Seisominen blokkaa työläisten kulkemisen, joten Herculla pitää käydä vetämässä varjokopiota turpaan, että työläiset uskaltaa taas jatkaa matkaa.

-Jostain syystä tässä neljännessä osassa on ihan hirveä pop-up helvetti käynnissä kesken pelin. Koko ajan tulee jotain "tee nyt näin ja sitten vielä näin" -ohjeita. Luulisi, että neljänteen osaan mennessä perusjutut osataan jo. Aikaisemmissa osissa ei ollut tällaista, joten ikävä kyllä kädestä pitelyä on tullut enemmän esiin. Muitakin hiton turhia keskustelupätkiä on tullut kehiin, mitkä ei kiinnosta tällaisessa pelissä pätkääkään.

-Bonuslevelien lisäksi kehiin on tullut SUPER BONUS LEVEL. SUPER BONUS LEVEL on tavallinen jakso, joten se siitä megahyperdupersuperjeejeetakatukkaoumaigaad -fiilistelystä.

-Jaksosuunnittelu ottaa harppauksen eteenpäin. Tässä on aika monta jaksoa, jossa pitää sen perinteisen yhden/kahden suoran reitin lisäksi osata katsoa kartasta useampaa aluetta kerrallaan. On kaikenlaisia portaaleja sun muita, mitkä vievät kartan toiselle reunalle ja niin edelleen. Itseltäni meni hetki välillä hahmottaa, että mistäs tätä kartan purkamista voikaan jatkaa. Hyvä lisäys siis ja tuo lisää sävyä peliin. Muutenkin jaksosuunnittelussa korostuu hieman erilainen lähestymistapa kokonaisuudessaan.

-Tällä kertaa "Beat Developer's Record 10 Times" tarkoittaa oikeasti kymmentä kertaa! Aikaisemmissa osissa riitti viisi record beatingia, vaikka kymmentä vaadittiin. Mukava huomata, että tässäkin asiassa on kehitytty.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028015450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 1030, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1601854792}
review:
Wie die anderen vorherigen Teile der Serie ein tolles , witziges Game für zwischendurch wenn man mal genug von mächtigen games a la Witcher 3, GTA etc. hat.

Neu im dritten teil ist neben der Geschichte, teilweise neuen kleinen gameplay verbesserungen endlich mal etwas neue Musik, Bonuslevel, mehr Story als bisher sowie insgesamt noch etwas schönere Grafik.

Die 3 Euro allemal wert, die 1-2 während eines Sales jedoch absolut.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042373502', 'num_games_owned': 1345, 'num_reviews': 394, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 584, 'last_played': 1511453727}
review:
[b]В моем сборнике мифов Древней Греции было написано: нарцисс назван по имени одного красивого юноши, настолько прекрасного, что он влюбился в самого себя. Увидев свое отражение в воде, он так и не смог оторваться от него и в конце концов умер, а богам пришлось превратить его в цветок. Я читал, и мне представлялся самый прекрасный цветок в мире. Как же я был разочарован, узнав, что это просто белый нарцисс.[/b]
(С) Нил Гейман

[i]Жил Геракл, странный малый. Не чтил он законов ни людских, ни божьих. Все свою жизнь он провел в праздности, а подвиги, да легенды, что окружали его были совершенны другими людьми... точнее не людьми вовсе, а его рабами. Те работали денно и нощно, таскали еду, да золото герою, а тот лишь изредка отрывал свою пятую точку от гамака и каменюки ворочал. Но случилась беда! Нет, Мегара не нашла себе нового мужа, ее вполне устраивал рабовладельческий строй и супруг-лежебока. Случилось иное, герой молодой на пиру потравился, да в уборной закрылся. Просидел он там тридцать лет и три года, а за время то на Древнюю Грецию, богами покинутую, обрушились всяческие невзгоды, главным из которых стала гибель растений всяких разных. Но Мегара нашла решенья проблемы, дав мужу мезима, рабов она послала, чтобы те еду собирали, деревья рубили и почву удобряли. Чем? Да хотя бы собой, всяко не жалко. Самому же отважному герою предстоял бой с двойником своим зловещим, что ломает и рушит величественные здания... Нет, это не возможно! Я сказал, вы должны сойтись в бою смертельном, а не на пару рушить памятники древней архитектуры! Не слышат... Так, все, я увольняюсь![/i]

Всякий раз, когда я сажусь за продолжение, в общем-то, неплохой пародийной игры "12 подвигов Геркулеса", я надеюсь, что у создателей проснется совесть и они добавят новые игровые механики, разнообразят игровой процесс мини-играми, а то и вовсе, о чудо из чудес, вернут боссов и каждый раз разочаровываюсь. Данный игровой сериал не то что страдает от застоя, он с каждой новой частью лишь деградирует. В этот раз повезло сюжету, который подбрасывает нам то, что появился злой близнец, которому надо надавать по кумполу, а также то, что бравый герой был отправлен в другое измерение и Мегаре опять предстоит вызволять своего мужа из передряги, как это было в третьей части. Во всяком случае, если верить вступительным роликам. Но чтобы да, так нет. Спасать Геркулеса не нужно, как и не будет боя со злым двойником. Тот просто появляется изредка и мешает нашим рабам выполнять свою работу. Зачем тогда делать вставки между уровнями, которые читает женщина, чей голос и интонация могут посоперничать с дамой из Google-переводчика по степени унылости? Скорей всего для видимости, что это полноценная игра, а не набор сшитых белыми нитками уровней.

Что же касается геймплея, то он остался неизменен. Знай себе посылая рабов расчищать завалы, да собирать ресурсы, время от времени поглядывая на время. Разве что раньше игра умудрялась бросить хоть какой-то вызов, в виде пазлов, что разбросаны на уровне, а теперь и этого нет. Нет, пазлы остались, но теперь вам не надо их даже искать, ведь на экране появилась кнопочка помощь, где показано местонахождение как самого пазла, так и иных "спрятанных объектов". Осталось теперь сделать так, чтобы уровни себя проходили сами, да на золотое время... блин.

Музыка, которая раньше хоть как-то могла разнообразить игровой процесс стала раздражающей, так как к ней добавился один трек, способный вызвать зубной скрежет и кровь из ушей, отчего хочется выключить игру и не вспоминать о ней больше никогда.

Итог? Единственная причина покупать и играть в новую часть "12 подвигов" - это легкие достижения, но действительно ли десять часов вашей жизни стоят того, чтобы их потратить на второсортный продукт, разработчики которого держат своего потребителя за идиота? 

2 из 10 разочарованных минотавров
