author: {'steamid': '76561198012093560', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1472145969}
review: Time management z elementami hidden object, niewymagająca. Gra idealna na tablet i jakąs dłuższą podróż. Na najłatwiejszym poziomie raktycznie nie trzeba niczego strategicznie planować, nawet na poziomie średnio trudnym wystarczy klikać wszystko to, na co akurat w danym momencie pozwalają nam zebrane wcześniej surowce. Na tej zasadzie można przejść całą grę. Nie wszystkie achievki są banalnie łatwe do zdobycia, to zaliczam na plus. Odmóżdżający klikacz, więc jeśli ktoś chce się zrelaksować to polecam, a jeśli szuka wyzwania to odradzam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 1738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1738, 'last_played': 1510683586}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Казуальная тайм-менеджмент стратегия продолжающая историю о приключениях Геркулеса. В четвертой части сюжет закручен, на том, что боги решили отомстить Геркулесу и отравили его еду. Геркулес не умер, но на долгое время выпал из обоймы и за это время родные земли ушли в усадки. Нам предстоит вернуть себе свои владения, сразиться со своим двойником и отправиться с возлюбленной в полное опасностей романтическое путешествие. Нас снова ждут красиво прорисованные локации, в каждой из которых мы должны совершить определенную задачу. Последовательными действиями мы должны пройти миссию как можно быстрее, чтобы получить три звезды и так всю игру до самого финала.

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
¥ Красиво прорисованные локации.
¥ Игра на русском языке (титры).
¥ Сбор кусочков мозаики на каждом уровне, чтобы в последствии открыть бонусные уровни.
¥ За прохождение уровня на три звезды у нас будет строиться замок. Каждый уровень добавляет новый элемент. Мелочь, а глаз радуется.
¥ Отличный саундтрек.
¥ Порадовал более менее нормальный сюжет. Хоть он банален и примитивен, но он лучший из всех четырех частей.
¥ Добавлены новые элементы геймплея. Некоторые уровни можно проходить несколькими путями.

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
¥ Нет.

[h1]Достижения:[/h1]
Все достижения можно получить за одно полное прохождение игры на три звезды (в сложном режиме). К этому моменту все остальные достижения сами по себе уже будут пройдены. Три звезды на поздних уровнях получать довольно сложно, так, что за достижения можно браться только если вы действительно готовы будете потратить уйму времени на перепрохождение уровней, чтобы получить заветные звезды. Еще одно довольно щекотливое достижение побить рекорд разработчика десять раз, но при должной сноровке проблем оно может и не составить.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Лучшая из четырех частей про приключения Геркулеса. Проходил на телевизоре и игра отлично на нем пошла и радовала глаз. Я рад когда конвейер игр преподносит новые элементы и сюрпризы. Вы смело можете начинать играть с любой части ведь сюжет игр особо не связан между собой. Рекомендую.

[h1]Оценка: 8/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174444426', 'num_games_owned': 723, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1507274103}
review:
大概是个测试鼠标的模拟器, 完全不理解游戏性在哪. 唯一亮点就是画面看着还不错.

6/10

review:
作为一款休闲游戏，美术，游戏性其实还是不错的，我是万般无聊的情况下入得，反正也打完了，但是应该不会再玩一遍，大概寿命也就如此，所以游戏定价本身也不是特别的高。

author: {'steamid': '76561198000145982', 'num_games_owned': 1469, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 600, 'last_played': 1503118480}
review:
Аж Platinum Edition... только сейчас в названии увидел :-)

Перед нами типичный пример казуалочки click to win. Всё бы ничего, даже лайк можно поставить, если бы не одно НО:

Предыдущие части были лучше. Там и намёки на креативный и постоянно развивающийся от части к части геймплей был (пусть и без особой надобности) - раньше были и боссы, и нестандартный местами геймплей... и попытки разнообразить игру хоть как-то, и увеличивающиеся масштабы и размах от части к части - словом, заметно было, что работа активно ведётся над игрой.
------
Тут же вместо новизны и прогресса мы как будто откатываемся назад. Уж не знаю пока, что там в 5 и 6-й частях, но в данном случае я вижу лишь стагнацию и, более того, регресс по сравнению с предыдущими частями.

ПЛЮСЫ:
- хороший убийца времени. Если жанр для вас в новнку, то, быть может, зацепит.

МИНУСЫ:
- всё то же самое, что в предыдущих частях. Никакого развития и оригинальности в серии.

НЕЙТРАЛЬНО:
- относительно несложные достижения

author: {'steamid': '76561198245837576', 'num_games_owned': 1825, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 564, 'last_played': 1502490005}
review:
TL;DR - Buy it if you like the series. Get extra new levels, and play with your favorite Greek god Hercules. 6/10

12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature is the fourth game in the franchise. The game is not much of a difference from its predecessors. The gameplay remains similar to those in most of the builder games out there; this involves building and upgrading facilities, fixing roads, getting resources and at times, summoning the "useful" Hercules to clear the heavy boulders and Megara to grow trees on deserted lands. In Mother Nature, queuing worker’s tasks are easier than ever – there are numbered flags that indicate the order in which the tasks will be completed.

Special power-ups also are back. They are really useful, especially as the levels get more complicated. Moreover, there are hidden puzzle pieces to collect in each level – every 10 levels, they can be put together to form a mosaic picture. Get that 100% while you can.

On the presentation side, 12 Labours of Hercules IV offers an ok experience, although nothing spectacular. The artwork is cartoonish with bright colors and a simple visual style; still, the animations are surprisingly nice and smooth.

The soundtrack, playing from game to game in the series, gets repetitive. It's sort of new for every game, but it just gets too repetitive and not memorable.

There are three difficulty settings available to select in Mother Nature; Relaxed, Casual and Expert. No matter which mode you decide to play on, 12 Labours of Hercules IV is a very challenging game. The difficulty of the game progresses nicely from the first level to the last, the latter levels really require some careful strategic planning as well as management skills.

Overall, this game is just like the others. The Collector’s Edition is not exactly heavy on the extras. It featured 10 bonus levels, a strategy guide, wallpapers, achievements and collectibles. Still, you get it when you purchase the game. Enjoy it, and hopefully you won't get too bored of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051376939', 'num_games_owned': 817, 'num_reviews': 482, 'playtime_forever': 995, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 995, 'last_played': 1500372323}
review:
Вот она уже четвертая часть похождений Геракла, и как было ранее Мы получаем все ту же старую игру с новыми уровнями и новым саркастичным сюжетом.

В плане новшеств их всего парочка: тушение пожаров, осушение проходов от воды и лавы, и немного порталов. В целом всё играется абсолютно также, поэтому лично мне уже надоело играть практически в одно и то же. 

reVote 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198008038210', 'num_games_owned': 773, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 784, 'last_played': 1490479331}
review:
It's a Time based Management game with the story about Hercules and wife Megara. They are going on a new adventure where the gods are outrage because of the previous games story outcome. And Summoned a Fearsome beast that matches Hercules's strength.

I can highly recommend this game for some nice casual puzzling and relaxing.
Nice to play for a quick game but easily to get sucked into playing more!
Each Chapter has 10missions and each Chapter starts with a Voiced cinematic intro.
Every mission will have 1puzzle piece to find. With all pieces found in a chapter the bonus level will unlock.
You can easily get all achievements aswell within 13 hours. 

Pro's:
- Great Time Management game
- Hercules theme
- Voiced Cinematics
- Great Audio
- Puzzle pieces unlocking bonus level


Cons:
- No bossfights/minigames

Great price aswell i really loved them up to 5 and including 5.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975193106', 'num_games_owned': 1335, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 1555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1555, 'last_played': 1491580317}
review:
Oyun tıklama mantıgı ile olan oyunlar katagorisinden bir tarz. Kolay modda oynadım ve bitirdim. Bazi bolumlerde 3-5 defa tekrar yaptım ama hic sıkıcı deildi. Neyi daha once toplamanız neyi daha sonra almanız ve neyi ne zmn upgrade yapmanızla ilgili olusan bulmacaları olan bir oyun. Oyun mekanızması bu sekilde isliyor. Kesinlikle baska bir oyunda oyun aratırken alttabdan oynayabileceginiz kafa dagıtmanıza yarayan oyun.

6 lira fiyatı ile cok uygun bir fiyatı var. İndirimde en ucuz 1.04 olmus.

Ozetle (+) ve (-)'leri;
+ Oyun aratırken Alt+tab ile degerlendirebilecek bir oyun
+ Muzikleri rahatlık veriyor.
+ İndirimde % 100 alınır.

- Basit moduda gercekten cok basit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125771599', 'num_games_owned': 1111, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 456, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1452709012}
review: I played all four of the current games in literally 3 days because I was so bored (stuck at families house for two months). Each of them made me smile in my time of complete and utter boredom. I wouldn't have found them if my familie's internet wasn't terrible and I couldn't play anything else really (took 2 hrs to download even these games). I'm glad I did find and play them though I love greek and roman mythology, although these are very loosely based. They're cute and fun and rewarding. So if you find yourself bored or need a simple game to detox a nasty rage quit play these they'll soothe the sadness and rage away for a time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045655704', 'num_games_owned': 3553, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1489840599}
review:
On ne change pas une méthode qui gagne, le quatrième volet de la série reprend à nouveau les mêmes codes que les anciens, nous donnant une fois de plus un petit jeu sympa pour passer le temps.
Dans cet opus, les Dieux veulent se venger de tout ce que Hercules leur a fait subir et l'empoisonnent. Il lui faut un an pour s'en remettre, et une fois sur pied, il constate que son royaume a été déserté. Tout est asséché. Avec l'aide de sa femme Megara, il va devoir redonner à la nature sa beauté perdue. Mais pour lui mettre des bâtons dans les roues, les Dieux font sortir un Hercules maléfique d'un miroir magique.
Mêmes mécaniques donc, le même gameplay également. On a tout de même droit à deux ou trois nouveautés bienvenues, comme l'arrivée des portails dans certains niveaux.
Encore une fois, le 100% succès est ralenti par les temps des développeurs à battre, comme dans les deuxième et troisième jeux.
[i]12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature[/i] fait souvent l'objet de réductions attractives en offre de la semaine, il est intéressant de le prendre à ce moment-là.

[code]Vous avez aimé cette petite évaluation ? Retrouvez-en d'autres en rejoignant notre groupe de rédaction : [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/onlespreferefroids#curation]On les préfère froids.[/url][/code]

review: A great little time management game and the fourth in the series adds more levels and more to the simple story. Each of the games in this series are offering longer playtime and more challenging levels. All of the levels feel very different and thought out. author: {'steamid': '76561198190537711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 296, 'playtime_forever': 764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 749, 'last_played': 1488848531}
review:
앞의 시리즈는 해 보지 않았고 바로 4편을 작했는데

가볍게 즐기기엔 충분하다고 생각합니다. 

고심해서 자원을 관리하고 계획을 세우는 게임이라기 보다는

바쁘게 마우스를 눌러대야 하는 게임이네요.

마지막으로 갈 수록 조금 지루해지는 느낌이 있어

총 플레이타임을 줄였으면 차라리 더 깔끔했을 거라는 아쉬움이 있네요.

개발자의 기록을 깨는 도전과제를 하려면 난이도를 어려움으로 하고 플레이 하셔야합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047540387', 'num_games_owned': 1228, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1709988572}
review:
I've played all of the ones before this, and as usual it's a great little game.

The game itself is easy to pick up and doesn't require much skill, as it's just point and click. It's incredibly charming, with cute graphics and fun little cutscenes.

Honestly, for £1.99 you can't go wrong. I usually get around 6-10 hours of playtime out of these games, and this one came in at about 9 hours. Thats good value imo.

review:
Oh no, no, this is not how it works. The Hercules 1 was a good game, but this one I would NOT recommend and this is why:
1) It's too simple. Although I set a medium difficulty, it's still weird I was getting gold medals only.
2) What's worse, the game is loosing any sense starting from chapter 3 as you don't need to plan your path anymore. All you need to do is just click, click, click .... click and click as f***king rapid as you can on all farms you have in order to send your minions to grab resources. Just make 500 stupid clicks ... profit! 
Don't waste your time on this game, take the 1st part, not this one ;)

review: Got Episodes 1 through 5 when on sale. Played the first one, completed it fully. Played the second one. Got bored halfway through but still recommended it on steam because it was a bit different. Tried the third. Nop. Same gameplay, same thing again and again. Just get the trading cards and uninstalling. All of these should not be separate games. It should all be one game with the price of each game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138535845', 'num_games_owned': 2256, 'num_reviews': 389, 'playtime_forever': 690, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1499179766}
review:
Мать природа!
Это уже четвертая часть из серии 12 Подвигов Геракла и по сравнению с третьей частью она сделала громадный скачок вперед. Во-первых, очень подробное обучение для тех, кто играет впервые, и к тому же можно посмотреть подробное прохождение уровня, если что то не получается, причем такие прохождения есть у всех 56 уровней, включая бонусные! Во-вторых, очень большие изменения механик игры - здесь и требование потушить пожар, после чего можно продвигаться дальше, и осушить излишки воды, и потушить лаву, и порталы для необычного передвижения, а не просто по дорожкам, и даже в некоторых уровнях нужно включать воображение потому что необходимо пройти снизу и выйти сверху. Сюжет снова стал интересным, причем под конец он даже успевает сделать неожиданный поворот. Уровней стало больше. Играть стало значительно интереснее, и это действительно очень круто.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058115931', 'num_games_owned': 4434, 'num_reviews': 503, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1487881530}

author: {'steamid': '76561198058693997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1136, 'last_played': 1480418191}
review:
Je repose mon évaluation du premier opus puisque toute la série se vaut :
"La série des Jeux Hercules est sympa bien qu'assez répétitive à la longue. On peut s'intéresser à ces jeux lorsque comme moi on est en train de faire autre chose et que l'on veut juste un petit jeu cool que l'on peut arréter quand on veut . Cette série dispose d'un certain challenge quand on veut finir tous les succès notamment les records de devellopeurs qui peuvent donner un peu de fil à retordre.
En résumé j'ai passé un moment agréable sur cette suite à l'esthétique agréable mais il faut aimer ce genre de jeu de gestion. Il n'y aura pas de frissons, de combats épiques ou encore de défis grandioses .... Juste du click en folie :)"

author: {'steamid': '76561198096695754', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 233, 'playtime_forever': 659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1508016141}
review:
О, да, ещё одна серия игры, которая стоит своих денег, класс! Игра по прежнему хорошая и авторы постепенно добавляют в каждую серию что-то новое. Например теперь чтоб победить рекорд авторов надо искать дополнительные очки, которые спрятаны на уровнях и это хорошо. В 4 части мы знакомимся с новыми персонажами и друзьями Геракла. Похоже разработчики прочитали мой обзор на 3 часть и решили черпать идеи из сериала, это хорошо. Главный враг в 4 части его брат, а точнее его эго, его положительная сторона, вызвана сильной магией. В общем игра хорошая и красивая советую поиграть. 
10 БАЛОВ ИЗ 10 ПО ЗАЛЕПАНИЮ. И 8.5 БАЛОВ ПО ИГРАБЕЛЬНОСТИ. 
Минус в игре пока тока один, нету редактора карт или уровней.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074045320', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3055, 'last_played': 1486171790}
review:
Big fan, played all episodes. Episode one still has the best mechanics, you get stuff while being idle there, later you always have to click for income.  
Game lacks a speed system, but is more fun for perfectionists and much more strategic with external tools running it on a lower speed.  

Negative rating is deserved through the latest patch, the game now forces a connection to an online server spamming the menu with an ad for some other game - some "free" pay to win sheet.
Thumbs down to the devs for this behaviour, I don't pay for a game to watch you fukn ads.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158769859', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1144, 'last_played': 1484491024}
review:
[b]12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature[/b] is the fourth instalment in the [b]12 Labours of Hercules[/b]series. As I have already reviewed the earlier games and explained the core mechanics and changes in those reviews, I will skip those here save the summary that this game, like its predecessors, is a time management game where Megara, Hercules and their workers have to clear lanes, collect resources and construct buildings in order to progress through the levels.

This game changes very little compared to [b]12 Labours of Hercules III: Girl Power[/b]. The number of total levels is increased from 45 to 56, including the (super) secret levels. Some new music has been added and the story features a plot by the antagonists of the last three instalments.
The biggest change may very well be the guide button in the lower left corner of each level, where you can find the optimal way to complete the goals and find the puzzle pieces. Some levels also have items that you can click for extra points; the locations of these can also be found in the guide. Needless to say, the guide is optional.

I have always had my misgivings regarding the story and music in these games, but they do try to bring something new to the table this instalment. And I like the changes made, also with regards to the story and music. Therefore, another recommendation from me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140276299', 'num_games_owned': 768, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 678, 'last_played': 1561835171}
review:
[I]"Герк, там боги бычат на тебя, пошли, разберёмся?"[/I]

[h1][I]✎∿Плюсы[/I][/h1]

1. Наконец-таки появилась новая музыка, особенно доставил трек в стиле вестерна!
2. Новые интересные моменты, которые чуток усложнили механику игры.
3. Игра стала длиннее на 10 обычных и 1 бонусный и 1 супер бонусный уровень!
4. Появились новые враги.

[h1][I]✎∿Плюс-Минус[/I][/h1]

1. Я уже, наверно, зажрался, но чтобы получить ачиву на побитие рекорда разрабов нужно проходить 10 уровней на любой сложности, а не как раньше - 1 уровень на высоком засчитывали как за два (итого 5 уровней).

 [h1][i]✎∿Итого[/i][/h1]

[b]С каждой новой игрой разрабы всё больше удивляют, игра нисколько не теряет в качестве, а стала ещё лучше. Рекомендую для спокойного отдыха![/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198092645701', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 603, 'last_played': 1483318070}
review:
Mother Nature não traz muita novidade em relação aos outros quatro jogos da franquia, as conquistas são as mesmas e os níveis, muito parecidos. As únicas novidades presentes nesse jogo não são tão significativas, como por exemplo, o novo sistema de portais e uma versão "evil" do Hercules, que não alteram muito a mecânica do jogo. Ainda assim, o jogo é divertido e serve para passar o tempo, sendo perfeito para momentos em que você quer jogar alguma coisa apenas para se distrair. 

Os níveis se tornaram ligeiramente mais complexos, em algumas fases você pode acabar disperdiçando recursos em coisas que não são realmente necessárias, te fazendo perder tempo. Algumas conquistas também não são tão fáceis, e nem todas são liberadas na primeira campanha. Apesar de tudo, o jogo é uma repetição dos outros jogos da franquia, e, principalmente pra quem jogou os outros 4, pode se tornar cansativo e enjoativo. Ainda assim, vale a pena em uma promoção.

review:
Another strong installment in the 12 Labours franchise. IV Mother Nature doesn't add any major improvements or developments over the previous 3 games, but yet feels smoother and more polished.

If you like time and resource management games, then I can recommend this along with the previous games.
The only issue I had was some mouse acceleration problems (due to my alt-tabbing) but a restart fixed the problem.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988271944', 'num_games_owned': 1346, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1479863632}
review:
Quarto capitolo della serie 12 Labours of Hercules. Come al solito sarò ripetitivo; ma questo gioco non delude mai.

Sempre lo stesso stile di gioco, la stessa metodologia che vi terrà incollati allo schermo, livello dopo livello, fino a quando non lo completerete.

Gioco semplice, che richiede solo un minimo di pianificazione per perseguire i nostri obbiettivi e superare i livelli ma senza doversi sforzare troppo.

Consigliato a chi piace il genere e a chi non è solito giocare questi tipi di giochi.

Il gioco spesso e volentieri è scontatissimo qui su Steam e secondo il mio parere varrebbe già di per se il suo prezzo pieno.

In questo capitolo non ci sono state aggiunte di nessun tipo, è tale e quale al precedente, tantomeno qualche traccia musicale in più visto che dopo un pò di tempo sempre le stesse canzoni vengono a noia. 

Come ogni capitolo della serie, personalmente consiglio anche questo.

Voto 6,5/10

review: Пилим, чистим, рубим, таскаем, потом опять пилим, опять чистим, опять таскаем, тыкаем Геракла, опять пилим, опять таскаем, тыкаем жену Геракла, копаем, долбим, таскаем. review:
一代我给过好评了 之后的每一代 都是这样重复的内容和玩法 我给差评

author: {'steamid': '76561198081925109', 'num_games_owned': 520, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1477755328}
review:
Serinin önceki üç oyununu da oynayıp bitirmiş biri olarak, bu dördüncü oyunu sıkılarak, bunalarak bitirdiğimi itiraf etmem, siz okurlara olan borcumdur. Peki beni bu "beğenmeme" kararına iten sebepler neler?

[h1] OYNANIŞTAKİ ARTILAR	[/h1]

Öncelikle serinin oyuncuları olarak, önceki oyunlarda olması gerekn bazı şeylerin bu oyuna eklendiğini görmek bizleri mutlu etti. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/mavilevye/recommended/360650/] Şuradan	[/url] ulaşabileceğiniz, serinin üçüncü oyununun özelliklerine ek olarak:

[list]
    [*]Haritanın üzerinde uçan kuşlara tıkladığımızda, onları pişmiş tavuğa çevirme özelliği için, her kuş başına ekstra puan alma,
    [*]Bazı bölümlerdeki yan görevler, (örneğin 4 kafatası bulma, 6 testi bulma gibi)
    [*]Yine bazı bölümlerde gördüğümüz "portal" sistemi,
    [*] "Hydrant" (yangın musluğu) ve "ağaç" açma/oluşturma, inci toplama (oyundaki taş kaldırma sistemi şeklinde)
[/list]
gibi küçük şeyler eklenmiş durumda. 

   Ancak dışarıdan bakıldığında çok gibi görünen, oyun içerisindeyse pek büyük bir etki yaratmayan bu yeni özellikler, bu oyunun sıkıcı olmasını değiştirememiş. Labirent gibi uzayan bölümler o kadar sıkıcı ki,normalde kısa sürede bitirdiğim oyunu, ara vere vere 2-3 ayda bitirdim. Hatta oyun o kadar sıkıcı ki, şu incelemeyi hemen kapatıp kalkıp gidesim var. Ama oyunun ne kadar kötü olduğunu sizlere bildirmem, boynumun borcu.

[b] Oyundaki en güzel özelliklerden biri olan	[/b] kafiyeli ara videoların [u] berbat edilmesi	[/u] de cabası. Vİdeoları seslendiren abimizin yerini bir ablamız almış, videoda okunan metin berbat, üstüne hikaye berbat...

[h1] Kısacası,	[/h1] serinin yüz karası olan ve sıradaki beşinci oyunu, greenlighttaki altıncı oyunu ve muhtemelen yapım aşamasındaki yedinci oyunu aldırmamak için yapılmış, "Çalıştırıyorsun yazık değil mi işçilere, daha kaç oyun alıp para kazandıracaksınız biz beleşçilere" felsefesi benimsenmiş bu oyun, kesinlikle [i] "oynanmaması gereken" [/i] bir oyundur.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982504799', 'num_games_owned': 4252, 'num_reviews': 2873, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 510, 'last_played': 1481317913}
review:
12 подвигов Геракла 4: Мать природа (Платиновое издание) - продолжении серии казуалок от "Реактивных псин", от предыдущих частей не слишком отличающееся (но в данном случае это наверное и хорошо).

[h1]Сюжет.[/h1]
В этой серии мифы о подвигах Геракла не используются, а придуман сюжет где злые боги которые строили нам козни в предыдущих частях решили объединиться... чтобы строить козни в этой. В данной части также слегка используется сюжет о Троянском коне. Имхо в прошлых частях сюжет был более основателен.

[h1]Геймплей.[/h1]
Игра практически во всем повторяет 3 часть. Эта часть стала проще, за счет введения обучающих подсказок в первых миссиях, и возможности включить помощь, где детально разжеван алгоритм прохождения уровня и нахождение кусочков паззлов. Из нововведений: на некоторых уровнях появились скрытые предметы за нахождение которых даются очки, появилось возможность скачать обои из меню игры, эпизодов теперь не 4, а 5. В остальном все как и в прошлых частях.

[h1]Графика и звуки.[/h1]
В игре добавилась новая мелодия (в первых эпизодах), графика стала чуть красивее за счет погодных и других спецэффектов. Есть хорошая английская озвучка, кажется дикторшей озвучивавшей вторую часть.

[h1]Как итог.[/h1]
Неплохое продолжении хорошей казуалки. Визуально игра стало симпатичнее, но несколько потеряла в сюжете. Любителям жанра, а также тем кто хочет разнообразия ради сыграть во что-то легкое и ненапряжное, рекомендую.
8 природных катаклизмов из 10.

P.s: обзоры на прошлые части -
1) [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Drogobar/recommended/342580] 12 Labours of Hercules [/url]
2) [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Drogobar/recommended/360640] 12 Labours of Hercules II: The Cretan Bull [/url]
3) [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Drogobar/recommended/360650] 12 Labours of Hercules III: Girl Power [/url]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1126011506

[i]P.s: если этот обзор был для Вас полезен ставьте лайк, а также добавляйтесь в друзья и подписывайтесь на меня как куратора - [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28776273/] Обзоры онлайн [/url][/i]

review: Pěkná, jednoduchá a chytlavá hra. Pro děti vysloveně moc pěkná i graficky, pro dospělé někdy až příliš primitivní, a to jak herně, tak "příběhově" a vykreslením postav. Jednotlivá kola jsou ale herně opravdu hezky zpracovaná. Je jenom škoda, že s řeckou mytologií to nemá lautrnic společného, přestože se tak tváří - překrucuje ji strašně křečovitě a opravdu často. (Hádám, že většině hráčů je to jedno, protože v ní jde úplně o něco jinýho, ale u školáků, co mají pocit, že si tím částečně nahradí povinnou četbu, bych na to byla opatrná.) K odreagování je ale skvělá.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996273719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 798, 'playtime_forever': 519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1455384483}
review:
[h1] Vorwort [/h1]

Diese Serie macht Spaß und man kann gut seine Zeit damit vertreiben. Im Herzen, ist es aber das gleiche Spiel, unabhängig von Verbesserungen und neuen Funktionen. Aus diesem Grund kann es schnell langweilig werden. 12 Labours of Hercules IV bietet aber die gleiche, solide Erfahrung wie die vorherigen Spiele.  

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

Das Gameplay hat sich zu den Vorgängern nicht verändert. Man schickt seine Arbeiter/Helden zum Ressourcen einsammeln, diese werden dann benutzt, um Gebäude auszubauen oder Hindernisse zu beseiten. 

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ gute Spielzeit
+ Unterstützung verschiedener Betriebssysteme
+ Errungenschaften und Trading Cards
+ hat eine kleine Geschichte, hatten früheren Spiele der Serie nicht
+ feundlicher gestaltet, wie die früheren Teile
+ bietet neue Spielmechaniken, Features und Bösewichte
+ Megara und Hercules stehen mehr im Vordergrund und spielen eine aktive Rolle

[h1] Neutral [/h1]

- Im Grafikdesign hat sich zu den Vorgängern wenig geändert, entweder man liebt sie oder eben nicht

[h1] Nachteile [/h1]

- die Level sind nicht sehr anspruchsvoll
- einige neue Inhalte, aber im Grunde das gleiche wie in früheren Spielen

[h1] Fazit [/h1]

Neuankömmlinge können bei 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature bedenklos zugreifen, da dieses Spiel einen guten Einstieg bietet in dieses Genre. Fans der Serie sollten etwas warten, bis das Spiel reduziert ist, da man recht wenig neues geboten bekommt. Klare Kaufempfehlung für Casual Fans oder die es gerne werden möchten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074037869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 878, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 878, 'last_played': 1461465825}
review:
This time around Hercules battles climate change. 
Insane meteorological events have occured across the Pelleponensus - Sharknados, Crocodile Tsunamis, Moose Sandstorms.
Gaia is at it again, unleashing this madness upon the Ancient Greek world. 
Hercules must chub up and take on Mother Nature herself. 

Fourth time around and it's still fun. Nothing detracting from it. 
Good fun for all age gamers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165961494', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 733, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 460, 'last_played': 1473205791}
review:
[b]Eu esperava um pouco de inovação nesse jogo já que é o [i]quarto game[/i] da franquia. Mas, bom, tem inovação?
Que nada, é a mesma mecânica de sempre com uma única diferença que mal faz diferença... É basicamente o 12 Labours of Hercules III só que com um rumo de estória diferente e ainda mais sem graça e clichê que os últimos.
Esse é um jogo que eu recomendo apenas pelo preço e nada mais, eu comprei por 1,04, mas qualquer preço acima disso já não vale a pena...[/b]

[h1]Pontos Positivos[/h1]

[b]Preço
Cartas Colecionáveis
Dublagem
Conquistas legais de se fazer[/b]

[h1]Pontos Negativos[/h1]

[b]Mesma mecânica de sempre
Música (só adicionaram uma dês do último jogo e ela nem é boa)
Extremamente repetitivo e enjoativo
Longo demais pra o estilo[/b]

[u]51 / 100

author: {'steamid': '76561198118005728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 566, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 570, 'last_played': 1469343049}
review: 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature is a casual resource/time management strategy game. This time around, Hercules and Megara are trying to restore the land. Hercules still does the heavy work if there's a boulder in the way and Megara still brings the fruit bushes to life and also restores life to the dead trees. At the start of each level, you have 1 or 2 workers who you direct to do various things ranging from collecting resourses to constructing and upgrading buildings or gold mines. You also have to contend with bandits trying to steal your resourses. There are the familiar characters of Medusa, Cerberus, Cyclops, and Pegasus who help get rid of the minotaurs, ghosts, rescue sheep and move rocks to aid in the journey. If you find all the puzzle pieces in levels .1-.10 you can put the puzzle together and unlock a bonus level. Nice forth entry of the series and overall it's a very enjoyable time management and if you're a fan of the genre you should pick it up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025571064', 'num_games_owned': 2180, 'num_reviews': 1520, 'playtime_forever': 590, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 548, 'last_played': 1561671686}
review:
[h1] Симулятор раба 4, или беспомощные Боги [/h1]
[i] Jetdogs Studios [/i] поставили серию на конвейер и медленными движениями шлифовали свою идею на протяжении 3-ех частей, однако пару шероховатостей остались: высосанный из пальца сюжет и отображение достижений в виде табличек на карте путешествий. В остальном ребята превзошли сами себя, наконец теперь появилось больше музыки, её приятно слушать, она разнообразная, плавная и не надоедает, в отличии от прошлых частей. Красивые и разнообразные локации. Геймплей стал более плавный, Толики Сердюковы почти не воруют наши ресурсы, видимо всё-таки Вова вставил пистон за такие делишки, пазлы хорошо спрятаны, но самое главное, что при не самой красивой истории, разработчики умудряются раскрывать характеры главных действующих лиц, пусть хоть сказочно и глупо, местами даже ирония проскакивает.
Как бы я не ругал сюжет, здесь очень поучительная историю любви: оказавшись разлученными Богами (Геракл и Мегара), они не начинают пускать сопли и слёзы, как нынче майнкрафтеры, а пытаются найти друг друга, ну как пытаются, рабы ищут, герои стоят мечтают, дама лишь изредка поливает кусты, нейтрализует нефтяные пятна (да-да нефть) и торгуется, а наш джентльмен таскает камешки, ломает глыбы льда и открывает пожарные гидранты, видимо плотин не существует, не придуманы, да и зачем они?!
Свои 14 рублей (со скидкой) игра окупает с головой, не жалею о потраченных 9 часах, но если вдруг решите сэкономить эти две величины, то ничего не потеряете.

review: Всё тот же Геркулес, что и раньше, но намного легче предыдущих частей. Теперь уровень даже на сложном не составляет труда пройти на три звезды. Не говоря уже о том, что рекорды разработчиков побить теперь проще простого. Но даже если вы тормоз от природы, есть подсказки где все разжевано до мельчайших подробностей, что и как делать на уровне. Игра простая, но длинная. Отлично подходит, что бы скоротать пару часиков вечерком =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198028450654', 'num_games_owned': 5815, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 717, 'last_played': 1467744273}
review:
Ich liebe diese 12 Labours of Hercules Reihe einfach. Die ersten drei Teile habe ich auch schon weggesuchtet und ich weiß nicht einmal genau warum ich so einen riesen Spaß habe, bzw. doch eigentlich schon, ich versuche es mal zu erklären. 

Ich arbeite relativ viel, meistens 10-12 Stunden am Tag und habe in der Woche wenig Lust mich dann noch ausgiebig mit meinem Hobby, dem Spielen zu beschäftigen, weil ich das als anstregnend empfinde mich dann noch wieder mehrere Stunden auf ein AAA Titel zu konzentrieren, kurz gesagt, mir ist Far Cry, Assassins Creed, Tomb Raider etc. dann einfach zu anstrengend. Es muss also etwas her, wo man einfach nur ein bisschen klicken kann, nur so minimal nachdenken muss und was auch noch irgendwie ganz nett ausschaut, 12 Labours of Hercules ist dafür perfekt. 

12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature ist also genau das, was ich nach Feierabend brauche, wo ich munter eine Stunde rumklicken kann und trotzdem auf Achievementjagt gehen kann, wobei dieses Mal alle leicht machbar sind. Lediglich ein Level musste ich für die Goldzeit doppelt spielen, das ging beim ersten mal um eine Sekunde nicht auf. Ansonsten ist das Spiel wie man es aus der Reihe gewohnt ist, 50 Level, 5 Bonuslevel und ein Superbonuslevel, wieder Puzzleteile und eine minimalistische Story, wenn man das überhaupt so nennen kann. 

In irgendeinem Teil gabs mal so Bosslevel, die habe ich hier ein wenig vermisst, die waren ganz cool, dennoch bekommt 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature einen klaren Daumen nach oben, ein perfektes kurzweiliges Spiel für zwischendurch, viel Spaß beim Spielen.

[url=mediennerd.de/neu-auf-steam/] Mehr STEAM Spiele die mir gefallen[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198041949592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 605, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1467554715}
review:
Hey everyone and this is my review about the game!

This is a Casual Puzzle game.


[h1]Interface/Menu/Settings[/h1]

[b]Video Settings information.[/b]

[list]
    [*]You are able to play the game in fullscreen or windowed mode.
    [*]There is NO resolution size Available.
[/list]

[b]Volume Settings Information.[/b]

[list]
    [*]There is a Sound volume Slidebar available.
    [*]There is a Music Volume Slidebar available.
[/list]

[b]Miscellaneous Information.[/b]


[list]
    [*]You can toggle the game cursor into your cursor. Game cursor is slower!
[/list]

[h1]About the game.[/h1]

Hercules is one of the most laziest character in this game. His slaves has to do literally everything for him, such as collecting wood, food and gold resources. They are also able to build and upgrade structures or clear certain hinder. Hercules really likes to brag whenever he has lifted up a boulder.

The gameplay is practically the same on each level and you will have to beat a level within a time limit. The faster you are able to complete a level, the better your score will be upon completion. In some of the levels you are able to use a buff and you will be able to see a buff meter on the side of the screen. You can't choose which buff you wishes to have with you on a trip and the buff won't last for a super long time if you have activated during a level.


[b]Ingame Information.[/b]

[list]
    [*]Gameplay is pretty much the same all the time.
    [*]The graphics and the soundtrack are okay.
    [*]The story is okay.
    [*]The game is very simple and easy to understand.
    [*]The game is very calm.
[/list]


[b]Miscellaneous Information.[/b]


[list]
    [*]You are able to achieve medals and beating it under the timer may grant you a gold medal.
[/list]

[h1]Other things.[/h1]

There are different series of this game out there but the gameplay is pretty much the same. There are some little changes here and there but it's not a huge game changer. Therefore i will copy and paste this review over to other series.

-------------------


[quote] Reviews are always uploaded if i have at least played for 2 hours or more. Unless the game is really garbage and doesn't deserve the 2H limit.[/quote]

I Give this game a 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198016096893', 'num_games_owned': 11947, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1468709022}
review:
Легендарный герой Геракл и его жена Мегара вернулись, и готовы приступить к следующему приключению! Боги возмущены их поражением и призвали страшных зверей, способных противостоять силе Геракла. Звери вытоптали сельскую местность, превращая пышные сады в пустынную пустошь! 
Восстановите красоту в мире, используя все, что есть в вашем распоряжении.

Помогите построить Троянского коня!
Некоторые уровни включают в себя особенные задания на поиск предметов.

Отличное продолжение серии, не в коем случае не пропускать!

Бонусные уровни, красочные обои, новая музыка и новые приключения. Дополнительный эпизод! Множество достижений и коллекционные карты, И все это за 13 рублей) Если покупать по скидке)

author: {'steamid': '76561198059934690', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 753, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 753, 'last_played': 1467195180}
review:
It's... OK. To be honest, I just enjoyed the one Wild West-themed tune on a few of the levels. 

Other than that, it's the same gameplay as the rest of the series, with the same mechanics, same music, etc. No wonder they can come out with a new game every few months; they're almost carbon copies. 

Oh yeah, the writing/plot is still hilariously rubbish with no hint of actual mythology apart from a few references. At least there is none of the 'trying to rhyme' now so it's just garbage prose and can be written off as such.

5/10, got my 50 cents worth but that's about all.

[tr] [th]Other: [/th] [th]	OK I’m ready to take a break from this series as they prepare to release  #5.  This version releases a new villain and a few new tweaks to the system.  Overall it’s the same game as the 1st 3, so if you don’t like the old ones – you’re not going to like this one.	

The visuals are kid approved.  The gameplay has several options and gives some level of replyability. You can go easy and just play for a few minutes or you can do an entire run-through in a couple of hours.	

This is not a great game, but for the price it’s not bad.  Even better there is usually a bundle floating around somewhere with one if not all 4 games in it.  

You may just want to wait till it’s in a bundle then grab it.

Casual fun

Low price

Con:
Aimed at the under 10 crowd
Not that authentic to the original stories


Overall: 5/10 +1 graphics = 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198018893258', 'num_games_owned': 3719, 'num_reviews': 744, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 680, 'last_played': 1465305963}
review:
カジュアルクリックゲームの4作目。
今回は前3作で痛い目に遭わされたゼウス、ヘラ、ハデスがヘラクレスに復讐しようとする話になっている。
ゲーム内容自体は前作とほぼ同じだがいくつか新要素がある。偽ヘラクレスというお邪魔キャラ、資源を他の資源に交換するキャラ、各ステージごとの攻略ガイドが追加されている。その他にマップにポータルのようなワープポイントがありマップがやや複雑になっている印象だ。
さすがにマンネリ感は拭えないので、このシリーズを気に入っている人向けのゲームだ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198182683579', 'num_games_owned': 520, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1465308594}
review:
to i czwarta część świetnej serii ukończona.
Co do czwartej części Labours of Hercules mogę powiedzieć tylko tyle, że czekam na część piątą.
Bardzo mi się podoba ta seria, w którą grając spędziłem miło czas. Gra jest bardzo rozbudowana pod względem poziomów i różnorodności otoczenia.
Gra oferuje nam ponad 50 poziomów, bo dochodzą jeszcze poziomy specjalne które możemy odblokować kończąc każdy zwykły poziom w złotym czasie, co nie jest trudne, są także poziomy które możemy odblokować znajdując kawałki puzzli z wyrytą na nich literą H.
Co do szukania owych puzzli, to teraz jest duże ułatwienie i zarazem uproszczenie gry pod względem szukania puzzli, co nie było takie trudne w poprzednich seriach, w których szukaliśmy puzzli puzzli. Wystarczy kliknąć na ''kafelek'' w lewym dolnym rogu gry i tam mamy pokazane co i jak mamy zrobić, by odnaleźć puzzla. 
Moim zdaniem jest to niepotrzebne ułatwienie, a jeśli już twórcy zdecydowali się na to ułatwienie, powinna być możliwość wyłączenia tej opcji z poziomu głównego menu.
Oczywiście można do niego nie zerkać, ale to nie jest łatwe bo jeśli już jakiś czas wparujemy się w planszę, poszukując puzzla, czy innej znajdźki bo też są nowe, to ta opcja ułatwienia poszukiwań kusi, to chyba największy minus oprócz braku osiągnięć Steam dla tej gry.
Reszta gry to to samo co w poprzednich odsłonach, czyli gromadzimy zapasy, budujemy posągi greckich bogów, odblokowujemy drogę do celu, korzystamy z pomocy mitycznych greckich herosów oraz bestii. Nowinki to nowe lokacje i historia. 
ocena 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198080472994', 'num_games_owned': 1989, 'num_reviews': 542, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1464538632}
review:
Грандиозный финал трилогии из четырех частей!

Пусть в играх серии 12 подвигов Геракла есть ирония, самоирония, да и просто небольшая доля юмора (его высматривать с лупой нужно) - человека, даже слабо знакомого с мифами Древней Греции, сиречь Эллады, всё это довольно напрягает. Как Зевс, отец Геракла, решает строить ему козни - с Герой или Аидом это нормально, канон, но Зевс-то, Зевс! И восстанавливающий статус-кво Геракл, заставляющий собственного отца и других родственников "подметать полы" - какого хрена тут творится? Даже уже приевшаяся механика игр этой серии не бесит так, как сюжеты. 

Зачем и почему так? Не ведаю, но я принять такую трактовку не могу наверное от того, что вырос на сериале про Геракла начала 2000-х (где Кевин Сорбо Геркулеса играл, да и Зена мелькала в качестве камео - довольно канонная штука, осмелюсь доложить, да и находки интересные были...), я не могу принять такой вариант развития, хм, событий. Просто вот из-за этого я мечтаю, что четвертая часть будет действительно последней. Сколько можно конвейеров в наше время? Хватит, закругляйтесь.

review:
Boy, I sure do love doing the same thing over and over for every one of the 60+ levels.  Not only that, it's the same exact thing you had to do in the last three games.  So, that's like 200 levels of the exact same thing.  It's all so easy with absolutely zero challenge, but for me, this is my last game of the series and when I'm done, I'll be done.  Good riddance.

4/10

Only recommended if you like easy 100%s.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133092805', 'num_games_owned': 1892, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1465725101}
review: Опять гребаное достижение побить рекорд разработчика. Я задолбался его делать в прошлых частях, теперь еще и тут. К слову о достяжениях: Они в каждой части этой игры одинаковые. Вы серъезно, создатели? Я уже молчу о некоторых "нововведениях", которые вообще лишние. Гребаные подсказки во время игры, которые закрывают тебе весь обзор и мешают просто играть! Я млять 3 части вашей распрекрасной игры прошел до этой, я знаю для чего дерево или пища! И эти же гребаные подсказки висят и не пропадают, пока ты по ним не кликнешь, а время то тикает! Гадство... А еще вырезан русский язык. Зачем вообще вырезать русский язык и продавать в русскоговорящих странах? Ну не дауны ли?! Короче это будет единственная часть, которой я оставлю отрицательный отзыв.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087549678', 'num_games_owned': 1428, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1463243919}
review:
Hércules e Mégara estão se divertindo e comemorando, quando alguém envenena a bebida de Hércules. Após um longo período doente, os dois começam a buscar a luta contra uma fera que foi sumonada pelos deuses derrotados.
Disse no jogo anterior e digo neste: Um jogo bem divertido pra passar o tempo.


Positivos:

Puzzles muito divertidos.
Você também precisa achar um quebra cabeça por cada fase além de poder competir com recordes em cada uma delas.
Neste aqui, existem itens diferentes adicionais que você pode achar em cada fase.
Dropa cartas e achievements.
Pra quem gosta de mitologia, a história é muito legal.

Negativos:

Mesmo no início, os puzzles até que já são um pouco longos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027424772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 2109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2109, 'last_played': 1558761492}
review:
[b][u]Game Information[/u][/b]

“12 Labours of Hercules: Mother Nature” Platinum Edition is a Strategy game. The game was developed by JetDogs Studios & Zoomout Games and published by JetDogs Studios.

“Mother Nature” is the fourth episode of “12 Labours of Hercules.” Previous episodes: "12 Labours of Hercules;" "Cretan Bull" and "Girl Power."

Since this is a platinum edition, it comes with extra features that are not available in its counterpart; the standard edition.

[b][u]The Game Review[/u][/b]

Game Visuals

I want to mention that the visuals in the game are well done. The visuals can be adjusted in the game's option menu.

Game Audio

I want to mention that audio for the game is well done. Even though the audio is somewhat simplistic and repetitive. The audio can be adjusted in the game's option menu as well.

Gameplay

This is a time management strategy game, where careful planning is required, due to the limited amount of resources that are available; hence the words "management" and "strategy."

The game has five episodes with ten levels each. Plus a bonus five bonus levels for each episode that can be unlocked by completing their jigsaw puzzle level.

There are three different difficulty game modes to choose from: Relaxed; Casual and Expert. The difference between these difficulty game modes is the scoring and timer speed. The relaxed mode has no scoring and timer. The casual mode lowing scoring and slow timer speed. The expert mode is high scoring and fast timer speed.

Three stars can be earned from playing the game on Casual and Expert mode. The stars that are earned depend upon how fast the level is completed and how much resources that are left in the resource storage bins.

The star ratings: Three stars (Gold) is when the game level is completed before the time passes the arrow on the timer. Two stars (Silver) is when the game level is completed as the time passes the arrow on the timer. One star (Bronze) is when the game level is completed as the time runs out on the timer.

There are several special power up bonuses in the game. These special power up bonuses help complete the level much quicker. These special power up bonuses have a time limit tied to them. But they recharged automatically over time. These special power up bonuses are useful when the game is being played on expert mode.

There are twenty-two different achievements that can be unlocked from playing the game. Each of these achievements does come with some requirements that need to be completed before they can be unlocked.

Miscellaneous

There are nine different wallpapers. They can be accessed only through the game's main menu.

There are seven different trading cards to collect. Only three of those trading cards are given out by the game. There are several ways to get the rest of the trading card: Purchased from Steam's Community Market; Trade with friends; Booster Packs and its' Booster Pack Creator.

Final thoughts: I have found the game enjoyable to a certain extent. The replay value for the game is low. I would recommend this game, but not at the game's full price value.

review: Another enjoyable game in the 12 Labours of Hercules series! This one has quite a few challenging levels compared to previous installments, and adds a few new features. The special helpers get to do a bit more, and there's a new mechanic of trading food or wood for gold that works well. There's some cool map designs too, with portals added. You can't really go wrong with this if you like time management games or if you were a fan of previous games in the series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020487283', 'num_games_owned': 5988, 'num_reviews': 1183, 'playtime_forever': 1085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1084, 'last_played': 1462812168}
review:
花钱买续关系列，我在玩完4代之后对该系列未来的续作要求降低了不少
游戏延续了3代的几乎所有玩法，依然取消中文
游戏刚出的时候成就都没有，现在补上了，但是成就系统老玩家一定很熟悉
这次的大力神带着妹子一起来闯关了，大力神负责搬石头，打其他神，干力气活，妹子依然浇浇花延续女子力
游戏画面依然没有任何变化，一贯清新风格
游戏操作方式鼠标点点点，关卡难度适中，适合休闲时间玩耍
依然瞎眼的碎片这一代感觉容易找了一些，总之按照对三代的要求这个游戏依然得不到好评
但是如果降低要求，只看游戏的话，还是推荐喜欢这类游戏的玩家打折的时候入手的

author: {'steamid': '76561198002506911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 415, 'playtime_forever': 775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 633, 'last_played': 1462044816}
review: Not sure why I like such a mindless click fest game.  There really isn't any strategy needed if you play the casual or standard difficulty levels to get gold, or three stars.  But, it's somewhat addicting and fun at the same time while being mindless.  Same as the rest of the series you are in charge of telling your workers and heroes what to do so you can finish each level.  Whether it's building things, or collecting resources, your workers and hereoes will be busy at every moment of every level.  Fun game if you don't mind the mindless gameplay.  However, if you play the expert level, which is required to play in order to beat the developer time achievements, then you will find that strategy does matter.  Do you want the extra worker first?  Do you want to upgrade your lumber mill first, should you get the gold mine first......all of these things make a huge difference in your time for beating a level and therefore gives you a better chance of obtaining gold.  Fun times and looking forward to 12 Labours of Hercules V.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112866114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 330, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 603, 'last_played': 1461676514}
review:
The fourth time management game in the long run series produced by http://jetdogs.com/ 

I must admit coming into this game I wasn't really expecting much as the previous 3 are pretty much the same thing. However this is by FAR is the best champagne corker and need of a toast that the developers can come up with new ideas if i have ever seen one. In fact if they finish the series off on this one I would understand as it would be difficult for them to top as they have really set the bar high for themselves now.

The biggest difference to me is that your time management actions and mangament of resources actually changes the backgrounds of each level as you create rivers and forests and beautify the surroundings. On the downside this doesn't last long as you will have to do it again each time you replay the level. Like in Hercules 3 though you do get to decorate a palace which stays that way for good.

There are many new characters, obtscales and decors that have not been in any of the previous versions. Some which at first created a 'what the hell' moment as I scratched my head how to defeat this new enemy. Also worthy to mention is that the level layout itself seems to be improved and some of them made me stop and think what i actually needed to do to get over there. I also like how they have changed the expert level so that it represents one big star and boy are they challenging. No longer is it about just the quickest way through the level but also what else can i click on in the level to raise my score up. Try and beat the developers record on 1.1 and you will soon see what i mean.

The fact that Hercules eventually travels to an alien God Like land and traverses the portals and landscape to subdue his enemy was also well done. The story seemed some what more interesting than previous versions and was slightly disappointed that we did not get to see more of him and 'yoshi' eating megara's fruit afterwards.

I would be seriously surprised if Jetdog trumps this version any more without ruining it, but just in case they are up for the challenge here are a couple of things that i would like to see them maybe implement...

1) More unusual achievements for us to try and get than the old ones you constantly rehash.
2) Instead of a palace which gets better and better, how about a garden like the 'hanging gardens of babylon'.
3) While your 12 desktops are welcoming thought they could have been better placed as an unlockable reward for those who go the extra mile to unlock all the achievements.
4) It would be nice if there was a super reward for those who are truly daring to beat the developers records on all the levels.
5) Maybe some other unlockable cards, music, facts or even a developers photo gallery at the end.

In final i guess this made the biggest impact on me only because i played the previous three and they didn't reach further than a mediocre experience. This one really showed that Jetdogs has the ability to think both out of the square, puch the boundaries and deliver. Thankyou.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047460864', 'num_games_owned': 3167, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 573, 'last_played': 1494681879}
review:
His name is Oliver Queen. For five years... Oh wait... Let's start over. His name is Hercules. For one year, he was bedridden, sick, his wife Megara at his bedside. That's what happens you piss some (not so) powerful gods off. In the meantime, for some reason, his land became barren and desert. So now he has to restore it, bring the animals and water back, while fighting a wicked version of himself summoned by the same (not so) powerful gods.

This fourth 12 Labours of Hercules brings every previous good ideas and mechanisms back ; still the same kind of game but with new stuff this time, unlike the previous opus. You'll discover some interesting things like a new portal system, hidden objects, more complex levels. There are even some new musics, including one very entertaining reminding me of Django (Tarantino).

In my opinion, this is the best game of the series. But if you have never played it, I suggest to start with the first game anyway. If you're looking for another kind of games, casual, relaxing yet entertaining, or if you liked the 12 Labours of Hercules' games so far, I will greatly recommend you to give it a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043973348', 'num_games_owned': 971, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 593, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 593, 'last_played': 1457448827}
review: This is the fourth installment of the "12 Labours of Hercules" series.  As someone who's played the previous three, I would say this is the strongest, as it incorporates all the elements from previous games, while adding some new mechanics. Here, Hercules and Megara have more of a role than in previous games, although the servants do most of the work (of course). What's interesting is how they've added other features , such as a "Midas Exchange", where you can exchange supplies or food for gold. There are new tracks to the original soundtrack as well. The gameplay is like the previous games, so if you haven't played them, I wouldn't recommend to start off with this one. Great for casual play to sneak in the day for a few minutes.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991465987', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 278, 'playtime_forever': 746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1460053829}
review:
The creators of the 12 Labours of Hercules series are releasing the games faster than I can complete them :) Less than 1 year passed since the first game, and now I'm trying to finish the 4th and the 5th is already in sight. This rapid pace makes you suspicious that we have a "more of the same" situation here - and yes, while there are slight changes between the episodes, we basically have four near-identical games with almost 200 levels altogether. More of the same is not a sin, of course - if the quality remains stable and the pricing is right, it can be quite attractive. Fortunately, this is the case with 12LoH.

At this point, the game shouldn't need much introduction - if you're unfamiliar with the series, start with the first one, there's a demo and everyting. As a short summary, it's a time management game with appealing audiovisuals, good level design and a decent challenge on the hardest difficulty.

Compared to the first game, there are a few new elements, the most notable being Megara (Hercules' wife) playing an active part (starting from ep3, actually) - since she doesn't introduce strategic variety (ie. you're always best off doing all her tasks early), I don't find much value here. Thieves were also new in ep2 or ep3 (you can guess what they do), and in ep4, sometimes an evil version of Herules appears to scare your servants. Managing thieves does add an additional dimension to the gameplay, while evil H is just an annoyance.
The level design quality remains more or less constant. On most levels you need to make sure you balance your resources well, but there are some levels where you can find different solutions - these tend to be the more enjoyable.
Difficulty is an interesting question. I do feel that the games get easier as the series progresses, but it's quite possible that I'm so used to the gameplay that I automatically make better choices than in the first game. To counter this a bit, there's a developer record for each level beyond the gold time, but to be honest, I can't believe it's really what it's called - many times, I do better than that on the first try. So in the next installment, some extra difficulty would be nice.

All in all, it's easy to recommend the 12 Labours of Hercules series - buy one, play it through, if not bored yet, buy next, repeat. If bored, stop for a couple of months, and try again. When I think of the term "quality casual game", 12LoH is definitely one of the first game that springs to mind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035285721', 'num_games_owned': 5118, 'num_reviews': 1098, 'playtime_forever': 683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 683, 'last_played': 1456461256}
review:
[h1]"Water hydrants & Evil twins"[/h1]
The 12 Labours of Hercules IV: Mother Nature (Platinum Edition) is the last part (4/4) of a newly on Steam introduced series of casual time-management flashgames. It has cute and colorful 2.5D graphics and a lovely entertaining soundtrack (one song really sounds like Greek). Placed in the ancient Greek mythology you accomplish many tasks in even 50 challenging levels, 4 bonus levels and 1 Superbonuslevel. You will buildup your own home castle of many pieces during the level proccess.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=632664590
Part four feels pretty much endless. No bossfights but 55 levels, The specials are this time: Megara can revive trees to let landscapes grow, Hercules can crash hydrants to extinguish fire and there's an evil twin of Hercules which must be kicked or he scares away your servants. Other things are still the same. The soundtrack just got extended by one cowboy piece. The graphics are like in part three and the gameplay is busy as in part two. The goals are quite hard to reach. No global leaderboards again. I'm happy now to have finished this series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117812986', 'num_games_owned': 1834, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1458831143}
review:
数学点击游戏
玩法是通过点击来抉择是获取资源或者消耗资源消除障碍，
解锁前方道路最终到达任务要求位置。
bgm有些凑合，咚咚咚无限循环头有些涨，抒情的那首也一般般。
巨大的ui一出我就知道是手游移植作品了，所以肯定不会很难。
果不其然，游戏中有矿的设定，也就是用时间换资源，然后就变成了点点点的游戏。

可能是年龄大了，在电脑上玩这个我觉得自己还真是有些无聊。
在appstore上我可能会给好评吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561197981548323', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 4167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2032, 'last_played': 1697669387}
review:
A set of four equally nice, neatly made (in every aspect) time managers. Slightly diversified (with new game play features, bonuses and surprises) to make each game a bit different, while keeping enough in common with the previouse one(s), which shortens waste of time and nerve on mastering the next game, that's valuable. Repetative, yet it feels all right here, can't remember myself being driven into bore even once. I beat all four games 100% on expert difficulty and still wouldn't mind to see the fifth. Taken into account the fact that games like these are not my idea of fun (or they weren't at least))) - what better recommendation could i give to a game. If you are looking for a highly involving and entertaining, not all that hard yet challenging enough game - check this one. Probably you will be pleased even beyond your expectations.
---------------
Серия из четырех одинаково отличных и очень качественно(во всех отношениях) сделанных игр- тайм менеджеров. Слегка отличающихся друг от друга (по набору игровых аспектов, бонусов и сюрпризов), ровно настолько чтобы не быть совсем однообразными, и при этом не вынуждать учиться играть заново, что несколько сокращает затраты времени и нервов на освоение каждой следующей игры, что порадовало. В принципе они достаточно однообразны, но здесь это не кажется недостатком, не помню ни разу чтобы это как то обломало интерес к игре.  Полностью прошел все четыре на экспертной сложности и не отказался бы от пятой. С учетом того, что сами игры далеко не из списка моих предпочтений (по крайней мере не были))), вряд ли я придумаю способ высказаться об игре в еще более позитивном духе.
В общем, если вы подыскиваете что-нибудь достаточно увлекательно-развлекательное, при этом не слишком сложное, но тем не менее бросающее определенный вызов вашим способностям в пределах разумных затрат времени и сил - то это как раз то что надо. Вполне возможно порадует даже сверх ожиданий.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042831386', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 627, 'playtime_forever': 713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 698, 'last_played': 1457166137}
review:
[h1]Short version: 85%[/h1]
The fourth 12 Labours of Hercules game is undeniably made for those who are familiar with the series, but they will find probably the best combination of level design and gameplay mechanics so far.

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
While I was playing though Mother Nature, I couldn’t shake the feeling that it was made only for the long-time players of the 12 Labours of Hercules games, so this review is written for these people as well. If you are a newcomer, I advise to start the series from the beginning.

For the returning audience, they’ll find probably the best game in the series, combining the level variety/design of Cretan Bull and the expanded gameplay mechanics of Girl Power. The bulk of the work is still done by servants, but by assigning a much more prominent, active role for both Megara and Hercules, there was enough change in the gameplay balance to make it feel fresh and challenging again.
Speaking of balance, a lot of small things were tweaked: for example thieves (and a new enemy, anti-Hercules) are less annoying or farms are more manageable. These seem insignificant on their own, but added up they make the game a lot more fun.

As a final bonus, there is now even some semblance of a story: Megara and Hercules start on a journey to regrow the Hellenic forests before they go on a well-earned vacation, struggling against the meddling gods all the time. It’s a bit silly sometimes, but it shows that the developers really cared.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963714403', 'num_games_owned': 10428, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 5447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5447, 'last_played': 1455487665}

author: {'steamid': '76561198135300741', 'num_games_owned': 444, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1469756208}
review:
ヘラクレスとゆかいな仲間たちのマラソンゲーム４作目。
３までは日本語対応していたけれど残念ながら今回は現時点では未対応。
でも元々わかりやすいストーリーなのでほとんど問題はない。
基本的なルールは今までと同じ。

今回はヘラクレスの偽物が度々登場して「ﾊｧｰｰ！！！」って謎のオーラ出して妨害してくるので
我らがヒーローのヘラクレスに退治してもらう必要がある。
それと資源を別の資源へとトレードしてくれるキャラクターも登場するので
必要に応じてうまく活用しなくてはならないだろう。

追記：いつの間に日本語対応されたようです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198018061433', 'num_games_owned': 1510, 'num_reviews': 1588, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1455224813}
review:
Tolle Reihe, die immer weiter fortgesetzt wird :)



was ist neu in Mother Nature :

- Gold Level erreicht man nur im Fortgeschrittenen Modus oder höher (nicht wie bei den anderen Teilen. Dort auch im leichtesten Modus)
- einige neue Items zum interagieren
- in einigen Maps ist mehr als nur ein Puzzlestück verteilt. Z.B muss man eine bestimmte Anzahl an Dingen finden um zusätzliche Punkte zu verdienen
- es gibt in jedem Level ein Handbuch, der für Anfänger gut ist und man sieht am Ende des Buches auch den Fundort der Sammelobjekte


Ansonsten sind natürlich altbekannte Dinge dabei bzw. das 12 Labours of Hercules System ist natürlich auch hier da.

Spielzeit ca. 7 Stunden für alle Level + Bonuslevel

+ Sammelkarten
+ Errungenschaften
+ fairer Preis / Game ist öfters im Angebot

author: {'steamid': '76561198040936596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 566, 'last_played': 1455173711}
review:
V dalsom pokracovani nie je velmi vela rozdielov oproti predoslym dielom - koncept hry je jednoduchy, funkcny a teda ani nie je potrebne nieco menit. Pocitovo vnimam jemne dopracovanie grafiky oproti [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/arnie_svk/recommended/360650]trojke[/url] a rozsirenie poctu levelov na 50. Po dlhsom hrani som sa precitol, ze nie je potrebne az tak sialene klikat ako v niektorom z minulych dielov.

V hre po novom pouzijete aj katapult a sem tam rozprudite staroveky hydrant :) Do deja pribudlo aj odstranovanie olejovych skvrn a sadenie stromcekov co potesi aj ochrancov prirody.

Hre nemam co vytknut, ide vo vychodenych kolajach a kto chce dalsiu davku levelov, nech sa paci. Cena v zlave je dost nizka na to, aby nebolo potrebne rozoberat ze predavaju to iste pod inym nazvom. Komu by to ale prekazalo, radsej zvazte nakup.
