author: {'steamid': '76561197971532357', 'num_games_owned': 2752, 'num_reviews': 413, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 721, 'last_played': 1453558799}
review:
After rescuing Megara, after fighting the Cretan Bull and after Megara herself rescuing her husband, what will happen now in Hercules's world? Well, Nature seems to die around, Hercules is sick but recovers quickly before being confronted to his evil twin and after bashing Zeus, Hades and Hera (who were his previous opponents in the previous games), he has to rebuild a resort.

And why does Mother Nature do? Well..., during the five episodes, if you save the nature, you'll uncover some new paths... Well, your servants are still doing the gathering of food (whether from a farm or from bushes or from cheese on the map), gold (whether from mining or the gold on the map) and wood (whether from the trees or from the workshop or from the wood on the map). You still have to repair bridges, holes in the ground, cover lava or acid pit, remove (golden) teeth or horns, etc... You can still upgrade your workshops, farms and mines to have a better recolt, you can still build obelisks to the glory of Demeter, Hermes, Hephaïstos or Apollo for permanent bonus, Megara is still used for growing bushes or pearls and Hercules for removing boulders, Cerberus for scaring ghosts, Pegasus for removing rocks, Medusa to scare Minotaurs, Cyclops to take sheeps, Charon to take floating ressources against gold... And you still have bonus that can be used for a limited time (stopping the timer, going faster, working faster, more ressources, one more temporary servant), during the levels. You still have thiefs, though they're not as common as before.

So what really changed? Well, now, Megara can relive dead trees or washes away oil spills. Hercules can open fire hydrants. And these actions in some levels can unlock blocked paths (because of fire, because of water, etc..). That's the major change in the game. Also, now, the evil twin can block the servants's path and only Hercules can give him a shot in the posterior. Two new characters appear also as merchants: Midas can give gold against wood or food while Epaius or something like that can exchange wood for food for example. And only Megara can negociate with them.

Otherwise, it's still the same way to tell the story, the same graphics, the same music, the same puzzles to unlock bonus levels and the same achievements as before. And for the extras, as it's a special edition, it's only a guide and wallpapers.

So, yeah, I wasn't really expecting a new way of playing. The new additions are nice though. It's changing a little the repetitive stuff (send servants to collect, etc..). Also, where you had a special final level at the end of each world, here, there is none.

So, the price is correct for the game. Those who liked the previous games will enjoy this one too. Those expecting more actions or twists will be disappointed. I've enjoyed this fourth game. And I do think that it's still worthy to be recommended even if there is no big surprise.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162294845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 664, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 664, 'last_played': 1453554979}
review:
Nach Hercules I, II & III kommt nun der 4. Teil der 12 Labours of Hercules Reihe und macht riesigen Spaß!
Neben Puzzleteile finden, Widersehen mit alten Bekannten und neuen Objekten (z.B. Portale) wurden in diesem Teil auch ein paar Minispiele (z.B. Finde 4 Knochen) hinzugefügt, um ein paar Extrapunkte zu erlangen.
Auch die Musik im Spiel wurde um einige Tracks erweitert.

Vergleich der Spieldauer (inkl. aller Errungenschaften)

Hercules I - 5h
Hercules II - 7h
Hercules III - 9h
Hercules IV - 11h

Die 2,99€ lohnen sich definitiv!! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198126015671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1453472007}
review: The 12 Labours of Hercules is my go-to series for casual gaming sessions. I can see the improvements being made in each new installment. The levels in IV are beautiful and vibrant, and I'm loving the new music. Here's hoping V has even MORE new tracks! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198059871439', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 413, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 720, 'last_played': 1468504320}
review:
☛ Worum gehts?
Megara und Herc arbeiten gemeinsam zusammen gegen die Götter, die ihn scheinbar eine Falle nach der anderen gelegt haben. 

[+]
○ Schwierigkeitsstufen einstellbar
○ liebevoll gestaltete Atmosphäre/Grafik
○ farbvoll 
○ keine Altersbegrenzung
○ viele verschiedene Erfolge, sogar mehr noch als im letzten Teil habe ich das Gefühl, man war jedenfalls durchweg motiviert
○ kleine Zwischensequenzen
○ auch sehr gut für Kinder geeignet

[-]
○ kann ab und an etwas eintönig werden durch monotonen Spielablauf
○ keine große Veränderung in der Spielmechanik. Seit den letzten paar Spielen schon keine großen Veränderungen.
○ Spiel bleibt durchschaubar (für Erwachsene, aber gut - die Zielgruppe für Kinder ist mit dem Spiel erfüllt)

☛ Fazit:
Eine schöne Fortsetzung für alle Fans der Spiel-Reihe. Hat dieses Mal einiges an Erfolgen mitgebracht hat aber ansonsten nicht sehr viel neues an Spielmechanik geboten. Sehr kinderfreundlich, aber eben nicht unbedingt immer spannend.

author: {'steamid': '76561197973230221', 'num_games_owned': 14324, 'num_reviews': 849, 'playtime_forever': 1018, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 613, 'last_played': 1545594698}
review: Yeah Round 4. Battle beginns. This time Hades, Zeus and Hera act together and how should it be, Hercules get a dark twin (Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time Water Temple greets). The game is like before getting resources and some extra fields are no in the game, Hercules can splash gems where foodbushes comes out, the evil hercules comes your peasants in the way and you must take him out fast to lose less time, if thiefs comes you must react fast. So not many change you have 50 levels, 5 puzzles where you need to find most of the puzzle pieces in the 50 levels before, then you get 5 extra levels and a super level at the end and you can try like before to beat the developer records as a test of your strategy and reacting testing with make your routes so effective like possible. Not much changed, but the levels feels still after 3 games before unique and i had my fun, for me its with a little step the best hercules of all 4 at the moment, but some could get bored after 3 games, because the gameplay is mostly the same, the little storie parts are a nice gimmick but nothing more. I give this game for 10 hours of fun and to see how old and slow i get (joke) but because i love all of this tacticaly genre 93 %, for non genre lovers it should be more less points, but because its cheap and you play it from start to end for such a cheap price, its okay, if you hate strategy games, you better go out this way, maybe you test on of the first 3 games before. Thank you for reading and hopefully enjoy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132743640', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1452190056}
review:
Oto i czwarta część świetnej serii ukończona.
Co do czwartej części Labours of Hercules mogę powiedzieć tylko tyle, że czekam na część piątą.
Bardzo mi się podoba ta seria, w którą grając spędziłem miło czas. Gra jest bardzo rozbudowana pod względem poziomów i różnorodności otoczenia.
Gra oferuje nam ponad 50 poziomów, bo dochodzą jeszcze poziomy specjalne które możemy odblokować kończąc każdy zwykły poziom w złotym czasie, co nie jest trudne, są także poziomy które możemy odblokować znajdując kawałki puzzli z wyrytą na nich literą H.
Co do szukania owych puzzli, to teraz jest duże ułatwienie i zarazem uproszczenie gry pod względem szukania puzzli, co nie było takie trudne w poprzednich seriach, w których szukaliśmy puzzli puzzli. Wystarczy kliknąć na ''kafelek'' w lewym dolnym rogu gry i tam mamy pokazane co i jak mamy zrobić, by odnaleźć puzzla. 
Moim zdaniem jest to niepotrzebne ułatwienie, a jeśli już twórcy zdecydowali się na to ułatwienie, powinna być możliwość wyłączenia tej opcji z poziomu głównego menu.
Oczywiście można do niego nie zerkać, ale to nie jest łatwe bo jeśli już jakiś czas wparujemy się w planszę, poszukując puzzla, czy innej znajdźki bo też są nowe, to ta opcja ułatwienia poszukiwań kusi, to chyba największy minus oprócz braku osiągnięć Steam dla tej gry.
Reszta gry to to samo co w poprzednich odsłonach, czyli gromadzimy zapasy, budujemy posągi greckich bogów, odblokowujemy drogę do celu, korzystamy z pomocy mitycznych greckich herosów oraz bestii. Nowinki to nowe lokacje i historia. 

PLUSY  +
Nowe lokacje.
Ponad 50 poziomów.
Przyjemnie można spędzić czas i się zrelaksować.
Gra nie nudzi się.

MINUSY -
Wspomniane przeze mnie ułatwienie względem szukania znajdziek.
Brak osiągnięć Steam, ale w grze informacje o osiągnięciach są i jak jakieś odblokujemy, to gra nas informuję.

Większych błędów, bugów i baboli uniemożliwiających rozgrywkę nie uświadczyłem.

OCENA 9/10.
                                                                     !!POLECAM!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198077719495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1452912392}
review: Thus game is exactly like the previous 3 in the series. Adjustable difficulty withapproximately 45 levels full of timed puzzle solving fun. Great for kids but also fun casual gaming for adults... I'm in my twenties and love the week or so of gaming after work that I get out of all four of the games in this series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062367748', 'num_games_owned': 1306, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 1025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1025, 'last_played': 1452549559}
review:
Ich habe alle bisherigen Teile und ich finde es ein tolles Strategie-Gelegenheitsspiel! Ressourcen sammeln, Gebäude bauen, Aufgaben lösen. 3 Schwierigkeitsstufen, wobei die 1. kein Zeitlimit hat.
Wie auch bei den Vorgängern sind in den Leveln Puzzleteile versteckt die Bonuslevel freischalten und auch einen Erfolg geben.

Die Entwicklerrekorde (Erfolg) sind in diesem Teil im Gegensatz zu Teil 2 und 3 definitiv leichter erreichbar. 

Steamerfolge werden noch zugefügt da es da scheinbar Probleme gibt. Ingame gehen sie und werden lt. Entwickler dann auch später übertragen (Stand 12/05)

01/06 Steamerfolge funktionieren jetzt. Einfach Spiel starten, dann werden sie übernommen ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198040550240', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 386, 'last_played': 1454252506}
review:
Отличие от предыдущих трёх частей в том, что кроме пазлов на карте можно найти и другие элементы (грибы. ягодки, кувшины), за них вы получаете дополнительняе очки.
Из минусов, конечно же, отсутствие русского языка и достижений в стим, хотя в самой игре они присутствуют. Думаю, в дальнейшем, и то, и другое будет добавлено.
Ну, а в целом, игруля такая же яркая, красочная и позитивная, хэппи энд неминуем!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198064050389', 'num_games_owned': 7953, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1562800371}
review:
They should call this the Earth Day edition.  No longer are we cutting down trees with abandon.  Instead we must recultivate the land, grow more trees, and unleash the power of...fire hydrants?!  Yes, fire hydrants.  Who knew they had hydrants back in ancient Greece?  

Mostly everything is the same as the other installments of this series.  The worker guys run around gathering food, wood, and gold.  They clear the pathways.  Herc hefts the huge boulders, and Megara causes plants to grow.

For those new to the series, this game does a much better job of explaining things.  There are pop up instructions of what to do.  Basically it is time management and resource management.  Each level has certain tasks to perform in order to complete the level.  If you do it fast enough you get achivements.

There are 3 difficulty levels.  Untimed, easy timed, and hard timed.  (those are NOT what they are called, but that's what they are in essense.)

I'll write more later as I complete the game.  I just wanted to get this up there since some yahoos decided to make negative reviews.
